name: VR Plant Journey
description: In this virtual reality adventure, you'll explore the inner workings of a canola plant from root to flower. What does canola need to thrive optimally? Learn about the processes in the plant cells, playfully help it grow and become an excellent plant scientist.

name: Greedy Bubble
description: A brutally difficult arcade game about a cute and greedy bubble that's trapped inside a cave. Can you guide it out while collecting as many coins as you can?

name: Escape Within
description: You will face more complex puzzles. Take on an increasingly challenging and bizarre island of puzzles that will take logical thinking to the limit. the island is unique and has its secrets. interaction with the elements of the environment will allow you to fully immerse yourself in the game.

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2018: Pagani
description: Pagani DLC includes two licensed Pagani cars: - Pagani Zonda Revolucion - Pagani Huayra

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2018: Rims
description: Rims DLC is a pack of 40 unique brand new rims with some color variations (over 70 total combinations).

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2015: Trader Pack
description: New package of cars, parts and possibilities for all car maniacs! Buy classic oldtimers, renovate them and sell with profit or keep in your collection of cars.

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2015: Youngtimer
description: Work on one of the most popular european Youngtimers.

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2015: Performance
description: New package with racing track, new cars, parts and possibilities for all car maniacs!

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2015: Maserati
description: Car Mechanic Simulator 2015 - Maserati includes three licensed Maserati cars: - Maserati GranTurismo MC Stradale - Maserati Sebring - Maserati Quattroporte Experience them in superb quality and astonishing level of details. Repair, drive, buy, sell and contemplate them.

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2015: Total Modifications
description: In Total Modification DLC you will have unique sandbox mode for all of you, which want to have some unlimited fun and not bothering about game money. Also all cars from this DLC will have unique modifications, which you cannot do yourself in game. Similar to modding, but it will not break your game saves or replace standard cars.

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2015: DeLorean
description: Legendary DeLorean DMC-12, best-known as Time Machine from "Back To The Future" trilogy. Take him apart, rebuild, repair and drive it in Car Mechanic Simulator 2015.

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2015: Bentley
description: Car Mechanic Simulator 2015 - Bentley DLC includes two licensed Bentley cars: - 2016 Bentley Continental GT Speed - 1970 Bentley T-Series T1 Four Door Saloon

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2015: Car Stripping
description: With this DLC you will gain access to special location on map, where you can dismantle cars for money or parts.

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2015: Visual Tuning
description: Getting tired of seeing stock cars only? This DLC contains nearly 200 new body tuning parts for CMS 15.

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2015: PickUp & SUV
description: Craving for 4x4's? This time we prepared something for all lovers of big cars - brand new cars with 4x4 drive, new parts and tuning kits.

name: Niflhel Survival
description: In the role of a Viking who escaped from the kingdom of the dead, you have to survive in the harsh world of ice and fog in Niflheim.

name: Selection Process
description: Selection Process is a game in which we will be in the process of selecting the job of our dreams. To overcome it, we will arm ourselves with our crossbow launching CVs and defeat the rest of the candidates who are opting for the job.

name: Bodies of Water VR
description: Immerse yourself in this new and exciting, VR only, sports-based action arcade game. Learn how to Scuba Dive, Freedive and Snorkel over various action packed, exhilarating and challenging adventures!

name: Riley Short: Sibling Circuitry
description: Straybots! Robots! Best Friends! Siblings! And one kid to short circuit them all in Riley Short: Sibling Circuitry!

name: Fairyfail
description: Slip into the role of a failed fairytale character and have your friends & foes join you as you build traps and platforms in this fantastical plattformer setting to leave the others behind in several rounds of racing to the finish line.

name: Church of the Midnight Sailor
description: A 2D pixel art RPG that draws inspiration from Hyper Light Drifter, Commander Keen, and Disco Elysium.

name: Universe Generator: The Golden Sword
description: Universe Generator: The Golden Sword is a short FMV puzzle game about the search for a powerful sword through the manipulation of dreamscapes.

name: Gos Castle Runner
description: Run against time, jump holes and saws before time runs out. Gos Castle Runner it's a 2D platform game of running and jumping. In this game, you control a small ghost that has to pass through the castle by jumping holes and dodging saws to reach the end of the level.

name: Mochi Jump
description: Mochi Jump is a simple, fun and addictive challenge of your reactions and reflexes.

name: Scarleth
description: Scarleth is an action rpg game with magical alchemy elements and a vast world to explore.

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021
description: Work your way to service empire. Get your hands dirty in highly realistic simulation game with great attention to details. Pay a visit to a new Auction house and buy cars in various condition. Expand your range of services by investing in new work space and equipment.

name: Jurassic World Evolution: Carnivore Dinosaur Pack
description: The Herrerasaurus, Acrocanthosaurus & Proceratosaurus are ready to be unleashed into your park. These menacing carnivorous predators will challenge any park manager. Don’t underestimate them, the success of your park is at stake.

name: Jurassic World Evolution: Raptor Squad Skin Collection
description: Be the Alpha and incubate your very own squad of raptors

name: Jurassic World Evolution: Herbivore Dinosaur Pack
description: Increase the diversity of life in your park with the addition of three new distinct herbivores.

name: 3D Grand Prix
description: 3D Grand Prix (for the ZX81 with 16K memory expension module) is a racing simulator with a first person view. You race against others on random generated track. You have to accellerate, brake, steer and switch (6) gears.

name: Cats & Dogs: The Revenge of Kitty Galore
description: In Cats & Dogs: The Revenge of Kitty Galore, players fight Kitty Galore's agents of evil to save the day and send the bad guys packing. Players will have to utilize their animalistic acrobatics and AI "Animal Intelligence" to make their way through various levels and obstacles and collect critical items and power-ups, which will unlock new areas as they progress through the game. They will also be challenged by a number of covert missions including helping stool pigeons carry out their air-based special operations and destroying Kitty Galore's treacherous equipment. Featuring six different mission types, including escort, stealth and combat, the game promises to deliver on all the excitement of the film, leading to the big showdown with Kitty Galore.

name: Beneath the Nexus
description: Beneath the Nexus is the bullet hell that's better with friends, focusing on precise movement, stylish pixel-art, and full parties.

name: Re:Turn 2 - Runaway
description: Re:Turn 2 is a 2D psychological horror adventure game. The game follows on from the events of the first game. Saki and her fiancé, Sen, are trapped on an abandoned train that is haunted by an evil spirit that takes the form of a little girl named Ayumi.

name: Wildlife Match
description: Jungle animals are going missing and Agent Blonde is on the case! Help her and her friend, Professor Fox, get to the bottom of the mystery! Match fun animal shapes, complete missions and face down powerful monsters on your quest to save the jungle!

name: Cube Blast: Match
description: Cube Blast will challenge even the most reputable puzzle solvers with a mind bending 3D twist on the classic color blast formula. Push your spatial thinking abilities to their limits, as you solve increasingly complex puzzles on a 3D tower of colorful blocks, with new and exciting mechanical twists popping up, just when you thought you saw all the game has to offer. If you are not yet convinced: there are also aliens, and explosions!

name: Kirakira Stars Idol Project Nagisa
description:
"You're the idol you used to sing to on stage?" After their first live performance, Nobuyuki and Ai have a fateful encounter with the top idol, Nagisa Yukihiro. Six months later. With Miwako's kindness, Nobuyuki and his friends attend a joint lesson with Uesugi Productions, a long-established entertainment production company. While getting involved with Nagisa through joint lessons, it is decided that an idol festival - DivaFes - will be held, but...

"What are you going to do? What do you want to do as an idol?"
"I want to join in--no, I want to try!"
DivaFes in a joint lesson, and Ai takes on the trial to take the next step as an idol.

name: Battle Lust
description: Conquer the Amazon Kingdom and all its tribes in this steamy hot F2P Card Game. Collect and form the best team to save the habitants of this kingdom through an addictive blackjack system.

name: Luffy: Way Back Home
description: Help Luffy - a little but brave kitten - return home to his family on an extraordinary journey through some stunning, yet dangerous and challenging places, all gathered in this relaxing sliding puzzle game.

name: Virtual Beepis
description: Virtual Beepis is a virtual pet gametoy inspired by electronic toys from the 90s and 00s. Keep your beepis happy, well-fed, and moving up in their world...until they die. But it's ok, you can always get a new one...

name: Training Leah
description: "Training Leah" is a SRPG with adult content, where you play as an unwilling hero/mercenary that fights to protect a village at the request of a woman named Leah. Fight monsters, train Leah, and save the village from monsters in this turn-based tactics SRPG.

name: Riotous
description: Riotous Is a Third-Person Shooter supporting cross platform play, players battle on 32 player maps in a variety of environments and settings.

name: Hentai VR 4
description: The ultimate sexy VR game is here! Prepare to experience VR like never before! A world of pleasures that you have never experienced before is waiting for you — just put on your VR headset.

name: Sweet House
description: This is a relaxing and casual little game. You need to help the beautiful girls to find their lost things.

name: Life Finds A Way
description: A short 2D platformer in which you are traversing a cave for a magic flower to save earth.

name: Heart Inside
description: You have been given the power to heal people. But resources are limited, allocate them wisely. Walk your unique path as a young doctor in the brutal world of the ruling dictatorship.

name: Mazeing
description: 3D labyrinth game Solve minigames to finish the level. In-game shop of upgrades. Tutorials.

name: Made to be Crushed
description: Made to be Crushed is a strategic and nervous local multiplayer shooter where you must succeed in trapping and destroying others. The winner will have the honor of crushing his opponents in the way he chooses ! Crush them all!

name: Longvinter
description: Fish, farm, explore, make money, and build alone or with friends while competing against other players in an open-world survival sandbox.

name: HopHeaders
description: We present you a miniature arcade clicker game about people with square heads jumping on platforms and avoiding obstacles.

name: The Magic of Three
description: The Magic of Three - is a hybrid puzzle platformer and match 3 genre. If you love puzzles, this is the game for you. Using the skills of the golem, you have to collect all the "Stone Orbs of Knowledge". To do this, you will have to use your brains, because not everything is so simple.

name: Yin Yuh
description: A Japanese arcade style game based on a cookie-loving spirit named Yin Yuh. Jump, drop, stomp, and throw orbs at your enemies through 20 levels. If that's too easy, try is on Hard mode and Insane mode!

name: Fate of Persephone
description: Fate of Persephone is a point-and-click adventure RPG where your actions and decisions have lasting consequences and uniquely shape your story.

name: Untitled Marble Game
description: Test your skills to the test in a brand new 3D mind-breaker platformer "Untitled Marble Game"! Various levels and a huge number of traps are waiting for you! There will be many difficulties on your way, challenge yourself to complete all levels!

name: Zombie Hustle
description: With up to 4 players working together online, wave by wave of the infected will be eliminated, can you stop them?

name: Mages Defense
description: In a fantastic and unique land, dark creatures seek to destroy the peace of the world and rule the earth. Help the Mages to defend the world against them building traps in their path and using magic in a colorful and happy environment

name: WTF Is Wrong With You?
description: Have you ever wondered WTF Is Wrong With You? Well, so have we... Let's find out together, shall we?

name: Rhythm Towers
description: Dance. Defend. Adapt. Use your rhythm matching skills to build defensive towers, in order to fight back mysterious hordes of creatures that will stop at nothing to destroy the planet's rhythm core.

name: Stitched: Mother's Nightmare
description: Stitched: Mother's Nightmare continues the story of Stitched, putting the player in control of a protagonist named Mia as she ventures in the mysterious doll factory. Why did she come there? What horror awaits her in the factory?

name: GraveRunners
description: This is an arcade runner game. Choose your teenage character and run through the spooky graveyard streets in a Halloween theme.

name: Wood Killer
description: Lost in a dark house, you try to escape from a bloodthirsty cannibal in an entirely unknown area, where many murders have already occurred. As a cop, try to figure out how to escape the clutches of the wood killer

name: Hextones: Spacetime
description: Connect the Hextones to control the unstable relativity of the Spacetime travel! A matchup puzzle game with sci-fi mood and time mechanics, and an even more challenging endeavor through space!

name: Crazy Foods
description: Crazy Foods is a massively multiplayer online battle arena game with upcoming crazy modes where foods are going crazy eliminating each other until one winner or team will get the fork throne!

name: Sci-Fantasy Defence
description: Sci-Fantasy Defence is a combination of RTS and FPS (VR optional). Use advanced technologies to extract resources, construct buildings and craft weapons. Use magic items from dark fantasy parallel world to upgrade your weapons and turrets.

name: Aquarium Travels
description: Recover aquariums from the evils of darkness! Aquarium Travels is an entertaining video game full of eye-popping visuals, just a click away! Recover the beautiful themed aquariums by repopulating them with fish, defending them from the threats that exist.

name: Soaring Machinariae
description: A girls' adventure story, told through a traditional action RPG! Control Iris the Machinariae to explore fields and dungeons, and fight against monsters with sword combos, items, and special moves!

name: Broken Legends
description: Broken Legends is an Adventure RPG where you control a possessed 16 year-old. Whatever is possessing this boy is turning him into a villain! Will you stop this force or become it?

name: Umami Grove
description: Umami Grove is a relaxed, physics-based VR adventure game with a plethora of creatures to meet and places to explore. Jump, climb, duck, and swing your way though a unique cooking adventure using a powerful movement and interaction system.

name: Protect the Earth
description: You are the best pilot in the space force and the earth needs you to protect itself from an alien attack. Protect the earth and then go to the invader's planet to finish them off once and for all.

name: Scrap Riders
description: Become Rast, a member of the outlaw bikers gang Scrap Riders, and make your way through the wastelands and the big metropolis controlled by corporations and act as a smuggler to survive in the wastelands.

name: Welcome to Lakewood
description: Investigate the sleepy town of Lakewood as you follow the trail of numerous missing person cases and the mysterious cause of the disappearances. Unravel the secret of Lakewood and try to survive its tightening grip.

name: Infected City
description: Infected City is a first person shooter. In this game, all people have turned into zombies. You have to pick up dusty weapons and protect yourself, and most importantly, save your beloved wife from hordes of bloodthirsty zombies.

name: Failed Ninja Academy
description: In this 2D platformer Ninja game slash through falling objects and pass each level to get closer to becoming a certified Ninja once again!

name: Slime's Revenge
description: Slime's have always been the bottom of the gaming food chain. But that is about to change. Slime's revenge is a short but challenging 2D platformer where you can fling yourself and stick to near any surface to reach the end of each level and fight back against the 'heroes'.

name: Powerslide Legends
description: Try to make the powerslide world record on 13 different roads or enjoy the padal to the metal with your friends or other players in multiplayer sessions.

name: Fancy the Frog
description: Be a hero Fancy the frog. finish levels and avoid dangerous enemies

name: Red Algorithm
description: Can you survive alone against hundreds of monsters? It's not easy. Try out Red Algorithm, a simple yet intense 2D top-down shooter with RPG elements. Pick up weapons, upgrade them, get new perks, and use powerful bonuses. Try out several different heroes against dangerous evil creatures.

name: Kittens and Yarn
description: Move the pieces of place and untangle the wool yarn for these cute kittens.

name: Renown
description: Renown is a multiplayer survival experience set in a vast and ever changing medieval world. Players begin with nothing, gathering resources, building a kingdom and fighting to survive in the hopes of becoming renowned across the land.

name: Which Wizard?
description: An online fantasy social deduction game about mystery and mischief. Use magical abilities and your powers of deduction to figure out who in your party of Wizards is evil! One (or more) in your group is truly diabolical... but Which Wizard is it?

name: Django
description: Django, a brave doberman left behind in the woods, will he find his way back to his family? Through the dangerous and breathtaking path of forest, you will play as django and explore the nature woods of Kodaikanal with dangerous and interesting wild animals on the way and uncovers the story behind.

name: Wilbur's Quest
description: Wilbur's Quest is a puzzle metroidvania about a worm. You've woken up in a strange land and need to discover what lies beyond the surface. Throughout your journey you'll need to push blocks, unlock doors, grow, and discover new abilities in order to progress!

name: BioShock
description: The year is 1960 and the player character, Jack, is on board a plane crossing the Atlantic ocean. Things go wrong though and the plane crashes. Jack is lucky though and finds himself outside a lighthouse. This is no ordinary lighthouse however. It leads to Rapture, an Utopian underwater city built by the tycoon Andrew Ryan. It's not long until Jack is contacted by a man called Atlas who offers Jack his support.

name: NeJ
description: A beautifull, immersive exploration game centered around the story of an outcast becoming friend with a puppy. To safeguard the two of you from hunters tracking you, you'll have to embrance your inner darkness and shift from prey to predator.

name: Terra Atlantis
description: Terra Atlantis is a first person shooter for single players. Explore and discover thoses worlds and try to finish the trials created by gods from this far galaxy.

name: Country of Cities
description: Country of Cities is a city building game, where you simultaneously control many cities and regions, managing an entire country. You will have to consider economy, traffic, infrastructure development planning as well as unexpected situations!

name: Orc Scrolls
description: Orc Scrolls - pixel platformer, your hero is an orc scout wielding a crossbow. Help the young orc get information and collect all the scrolls on the levels. Beware of different critters each one is a threat to your operation.

name: Love n War: Hero by Chance II
description: Love n War: Hero by Chance II is a tactical RPG. The fight against the Drogakan empire goes on. Build your economy, recruit heroes and upgrade units.

name: Swift Elf
description: Swift Elf is a 2D platformer with adventure elements. In it you have to play as a clever elf who found himself in mysterious lands. Help him find a way out, destroy monsters and go through location after location collecting bonuses on his way!

name: Prizefighters 2
description: A retro inspired boxing game with customizable leagues and multiple career modes. Climb ranks as an amateur to become the Greatest, sign fighters and manage your own gym, or be the promoter and run your own tournaments.

name: Infinity Valley
description: Race through different procedurally generated terrains with several different obstacles; compete with your friends for best time and most checkpoints while collecting coins in order to unlock new cars and levels.

name: Axiom Alternative II
description: Sacking an employee from The Violet Hotel soon becomes unwanted news on Grendel's malicious web blog. Can the protagonist stop Grendel from causing further problems ?

name: Dangerous Planet
description: Dangerous Planet - Space 2d arcade game associated with planetary gravity, where the player jumps from one planet to another, dodges spikes, and flying asteroids.

name: United Chronicles
description: United Chronicles is a new type of Tactical RPG which is characterized by real-time combat. Enjoy the special and fantastic battle.

name: Woute
description: We play for small shaman in the world of dreams, which moves in a static world to move to the next level

name: Vidora's Silence
description: Take a harsh but breath-taking journey across Vidora as the commander of your train. In this first person strategic survival game you recruit crew members, build your train, mine and explore the open world of Vidora while securing safe zones to expand your reach.

name: Acorn City: Tropical!
description: Build and Explore your very own tropical island! Use block-based building mechanics to create an island unique to you! Collect resources to survive and create. Unlock new items to help expand your town!

name: Bulkhead
description: Bulkhead is a dark, gritty third-person tower-defence game. Playing as the Soldier, build towers, wield your frost cannon, and protect the last thing you have left from hordes of iron-clad monstrosities.

name: Push Me
description: Push Me (if you can) ! Is a 2D platformer where your goal is to push other players into the rising lava! Use items to eliminate others while staying alive. Play fast paced games with your Friends locally or through Steams remote play. Discover new maps and become the best PUSHER out there!

name: Immortus Temporus
description: In "Immortus Temporus" crashing into hazards is... A perfectly viable strategy to beat the levels faster! Following the obvious routes won't get you the "gold medals" in this game. It's rules are designed to be broken. It is made for speedrunners, by a speedrunner.

name: Koboo: The Tree Spirit
description: An action rogue-lite platformer with strategy and RPG elements. Play as a tree spirit named 'Koboo' as you befriend animals and protect the ancient forest against hunters and an ever expanding industry seeking to destroy it.

name: Ballistic Machines
description: Build the world as you move, fight monsters and defeat your friends.

name: Street Striker
description: Street Striker is an arcade game about street fighting. Choose your hero and arena, find weapons, or use your hand-to-hand combat skills to stand up against waves of bandits and complete the level.

name: A Sketchbook About Her Sun
description: Through a narrative based on Red Ribbon’s new album “Planet X”, experience a broken-heart girl’s journey through thoughts, daydreams and music.

name: Whitehaven
description: Uncover the mysteries of Whitehaven Orphanage in this first-person psychological horror game. Explore the place, collect clues and put the pieces together to find out what happened years ago as you delve deep into your mind.

name: Beast Crimes
description: An unexpected crime investigation drama.

name: Clown In a House
description: A lone clown explores a mysterious home. He meets strange inhabitants on his journey to discover why he exists. Join him, and you may discover a thing or two about yourself.

name: Bear Soul
description: Bear Soul is a game where you pass levels and fight against evil in various shapes, rescue your cub from the wizard's hands and bring peace to the forest. Bear Soul is divided into several games, each contains its own characters, mechanics and storyline, but they all are parts of the entire universe. This is the first game in the franchise, the beginning of the whole story and an incredible adventure.

name: Incredible Dracula: Legacy of the Valkyries
description: Gather your undead cronies and set off on a journey through fantastical lands and past fierce creatures of legend to claim a treasure beyond imagination! Count Dracula awaits your arrival.

name: Way Back Witness
description: 《归路：见证 Way Back Witness》是一款架空世界回合制RPG游戏。 玩家扮演“异界来访者”马次娜·骸，见证忒瑞阴德上的是是非非。在这不属于自己的世界中踏上那注定不平凡的归路。

name: Kinduo
description: Kinduo is a local cooperative game where two elemental friends overcome obstacles to return to their island, push boxes, use electricity to connect objects, break ice blocks, blow things up and more in this cute and colorful co-op game!

name: Cat Packs
description: Follow the Cat Packs on their first adventure. Travel across forests, beaches, mountains, lakes and rivers to discover the source of the Mechanized Menace threatening the Golden Burrow. Cat Packs combines elements from action, adventure, platformer, shooter, sci-fi, and multi-player co-op games.

name: Azzy Battles the Darkness
description: Azzy Battles the Darkness is a 3D action-platformer about technological misuse within an elementally charged land, and the adorable Felko, Azzy, who is swept on a journey that may decide the fate of the whole world

name: Jaden & Jasmine: The Curse of Deception
description: Follow a high school student named Jaden Black who's on the run from the government. Jasmine Miles who's hired by the CIA is sent after him to kill him. But the task isn't as easy as she thought it would be.

name: Four Kings: Video Poker
description: Four Kings: Video Poker allows you to hone your poker skills - no extra chips needed! Now available from the creators of smash hit online casino game, "The Four Kings Casino and Slots" - Four Kings: Video Poker gives you the tools to be the top video poker player. Track your play with a full stats page, show off your biggest wins and try to beat the house! Get the royal treatment at The Four Kings today.

name: Clessidra
description: In this platform game you will have to overcome challenging puzzles using a weapon capable of rewinding the time of an object.

name: Pazing By
description: Pazing By is a GRAZE-oriented with 2D platformer and bullet hell game, player need to dodge enemy's bullets or stay near enemy to damage enemy. A game for graze lover, dodger, and bullet-hell player!

name: Mad Wild Fairy Tale
description: Take control of the undead king. Manage your legacy domain and protect it from mortal trespassers. Mad Wild Fairy Tale is an Action RPG Strategy with hardcore survival and PvP-Trespassers mechanics. The game is set in a beautiful dark fantasy world.

name: Comic Company Manager
description: Have you ever wanted to run a comic book company and create your own characters? Then this is the game for you. Hire people and expand your offices as you launch more and more comics or crash and burn with terrible comics no one buys.

name: The Legends in Kylamar
description: The Legends in Kylamar is an action, thrilling turn-based RPG that will immerse the player in a world filled with enemies, surprises, and more importantly, memories!

name: Catarro
description: Help Catarro in his spirtain trial. Finding all plush cats reassembling the path to his homevillage and his beloved mom. Spirtains! Au-au-tchim!

name: Akinofa
description: Akinofa is an arcade shoot 'em up with Roguelite elements.

name: Propulsion
description: Propulsion is a fast-paced 3D platformer inspired by the rocket jumping mechanic that has featured in many other games. The aim is for the player to use their rocket launcher to rocket jump across the levels as fast as possible, flying through a variety of environments, each featuring their own mechanics to spice up the gameplay.

name: The Terrible Persistence of Memory
description: When you wake from a deep sleep, the first thing the goblin doctor asks is "What's your name?" The problem is: you don't know. Retrace your steps. Find what you've lost. Piece together who you are from the strange and incredible things you can do

name: If You Go Down in the Woods Today
description: In this round-based survival game, you play as a forest ranger who has been stationed in the middle of the woods. The other residents of the forest are none too happy with your presence and will stop at nothing to bring it to an end. How long will you survive?

name: Black Mansion
description: The shadow of death hidden in the mansion... Survive from death by overcoming fear. What awaits you at the end of your adventure?

name: Thousand Lives
description: This is a game as beautiful and unpredictable as life. Navigate what fate throws at you and explore what a life well-lived can mean in this minimalist roguelite role playing life simulation. Life is wild and then you die - a thousand times over.

name: Cleithrophobia
description: Exploring the forest quickly turns into a nightmare, as you fall through the ground into an enourmous cave. Having no way but forward, you continue through the massive cavern, being met with hostility from the local wildlife, and exploring a lost human civilization, destroyed by an unknown force...

name: Farmer Life Simulator
description: Run your farm , plant , fertilize and harvest crops , or open bigger businesses in the town and have fun living the real life of a farmer .

name: Neon Fusion
description: Venture out on a machine-packed rescue mission in a 2D platform game, action, shooting and lots of Neon!

name: Oroborus: Planes of the Dead
description: Oroborus: Planes Of The Dead is an action RPG with town building management set in an immersive and simulated dark fantasy world.

name: Hard Steel
description: Jump to the arena with your robot and show who's boss... watch out for traps, losing is easy but winning is not!

name: Action Commando 2
description: The Action Commando Saga continues as the evil Cultists have taken over Saturn and are controlling people's minds on earth with their eldritch technology. The only person who can stop them is Chronos, the Time Travelling Spartan Soldier.

name: Overhaul
description: Solve your way through this fast-paced rogue-lite puzzle game and outwit unforgiving creatures as you venture into the mysterious Power Plant!

name: Bluravity
description: Bluravity is a 2D gravity platformer featuring a small block protagonist.

name: Pugmire: Treasure of the Sea Dogs
description: Intrigue between dogs and cats in a thrilling adventure! Can you defeat a bloodthirsty cat pirate and recover the Corgi Pearls?

name: World End Diner
description: Run a diner on the last island in the world after the destruction of humankind! For the cute animals and robots that survived, cook delicious food, run a farm, explore the forest, and create the best diner!

name: Freddy Frog
description: Freddy Frog is on a mission to be the highest frog in the world. This frog just wants to keep jumping and you need to guide his hopping legs onto the next available platform. Be careful. These platforms are not what they seem and a fall from a great height is not good for Freddy Frog.

name: Faerie's Bargain: The Price of Business
description: Become the greatest of the goblin merchants in this gaslamp faery-tale! Buy and sell secrets and memories! Trade in time, shadows, and stranger things!

name: Gun Game
description: Gun Game is a multiplayer versus party-platformer with guns that get stronger as the game goes on. Compete against your friends in this fast-paced, gun-toting, adrenaline-inducing shoot-fest for up to 4 players.

name: Wastehaven
description:
Take a road trip through a 1970s themed wasteland filled with broken roads, ghost towns, mutants and murderers around every corner. No two trips are ever the same with procedural paths, threats and opportunities along the way!

Originally titled "Wasteland Vacation", the title was renamed due to an InXile & Microsoft trademark conflict.

name: Luminyte
description: In a world full of darkness you have to find your way home. Solve puzzles and find keys and clues to reach the next level. Defend yourself against evil creatures with your trusty lantern. But keep in mind to fuel it up once in a while!

name: War Mines: WW1
description: Play using the logic of traditional minesweeper games in this reinterpretation of the classic game. Interact with the story of World War I by solving the minesweeper puzzles, finding landmines.

name: SokoMatch: Lizard Saga
description: In this game, you will help Lizzy, a lovable Lizard, to match 3 or more gems of the same collor in order to solve the puzzles and clear the stages! Are you ready? Solve!

name: Now you can't see me
description: First person puzzle. Solve riddles by closing your eyes or blinking them. While your eyes are closed, time freezes and gravity has no power over you. There is a funny voice acting and non-trivial tasks included.

name: Space puzzle
description: Space puzzle is a classic puzzle that offers you to put the picture together from a huge number of details!

name: My brother lives in a canyon
description: my brother lives in a canyon is a short adventure game about two brothers reminiscing over short-wave radios.

name: Medieval Shop Simulator
description: Shop simulator in a medieval setting. You need to create products for sale, along the way equipping and improving your store and your skills.

name: Run and Jump Little Vico
description: Little Vico is an alien who finds himself on a planet where there are tests of devices for changing gravity.

name: Dark Survival
description: Dark Survival is a horror survival game with a mix of the classic survival mechanics of find the items around the map to survive and the scary sounds and monsters of a horror game.

name: Race Project
description: Win or loose, it's easy! The rules are simple, be the first who crosses the finish line or survive. Believe me, don't trust anyone!

name: Flight 74
description: Experience a new genre of VR Flight Simulator (Rift & Oculus Quest). Do you have what it takes to survive and become the ultimate pilot? Run missions for the South American Cartel and prove your worthiness.

name: The Pirate King
description: imagine you wake up in a sea world, and you have to become a pirate, so if you want to survive, you should gather all materials needed to build your own ship to travel the world and To return to the real world,By finding the lost treasure.

name: The Dinosaurs Are Here
description: The Dinosaurs Are Here is a physics-based sandbox game set in a huge park where you control a dinosaur. Hunt for humans and try to survive against the park security guards!

name: Husky's Adventures
description: Husky's Adentures, 3D Cute Platformer Game.

name: Silver Blue
description: Silver Blue is a BL visual novel 15+ with anime style, containing adventure fantasy content. The game includes three love interests and their respective routes, with 10 different endings overall depends on your choices.

name: Toilet paper wants to be a basketball
description: A hard-hitting action-adventure game about realizing big dreams hidden in the light weight of toilet paper. Overcome obstacles, successfully dodge obstructive objects, and lay down paper to create a path in the middle of nowhere to reach the basketball goal.

name: Breath of Spirits
description: With the power of the Spirit, defeat the enemies and purify the land of elves. Gain different elemental abilities and various Elf`s costumes in single play mode, or cooperate with other players and survive the horde in multiplayer mode.

name: Space Transport Tycoon
description: Transport/ trade, build and combat your way to become the legendary Tycoon Tai-pan in this sci-fi/ cyberpunk themed space adventure. Grow your empire, design & build spaceships to deliver your cargo across the galaxy! Bring back the luxury liners & explore the cosmos in style.

name: Tizahl's Quest
description: Tizahl's Quest is an action RPG set in a 3D world. Unlock portals to more dangerous dungeons and find the evil demon to save the world! Learn magic and abilities and complete quests to obtain rare items!

name: Hidden Office
description: 3D hidden object game. Rotate and zoom to find all stuff in a checklist. Relax, have a good time and collect all animated glitter cards with cats.

name: Wild Souls
description: The world is your garden : chill and cute Ecosystem Sandbox ! Create your biomes, balance the food chain, build unique landscapes. Take the control of any creature and roleplay as a wild beast that must survive. Imagine your own uniques stories.

name: Dice Knight: Mystery of the Moirai
description: Play as a heroic gun wielding knight and explore a world where everything is dice. Money is dice, health is dice, weapons shoot dice and the story is about dice. Before you blast your way through hordes of enemies you must only ask yourself one thing: do you feel lucky?

name: Wandering Trails: A Hiking Game
description: Wandering Trails is a peaceful experience of venturing for a hike in the great outdoors. There are no goals, enemies, jump scares or achievements. There is only you, nature and your trusty old camera.

name: Vortex Rolling
description: Vortex Rolling is a third-person runner-style arcade scoring game.

name: Fractal Block World
description: This is a surreal exploration game. Explore a massive fractal with great complexities. You can shrink infinitely to go deeper into the fractal. Or you can become larger by growing. Inner space awaits you in this infinite world.

name: Spaceship For Newbies
description:
Fly a spaceship made of scrap through obstacles in outer space - using only one button!

ONE BUTTON MECHANIC
Maneuver the spaceship through different zones and obstacles - like asteroids, laser beams, and more - with only one button!

ART STYLE
Fantastic pixel art visuals, which include explosion effects, delicate clouds and enchanting constellations.

EXPLORE NEW SYSTEMS
Pass through portals with your spaceship, reach new systems, and discover new adventures!

ENVIRONMENT MECHANICS
Laser beams, alien portals, and slow zones… Which of these will seal your fate?

name: Wayfinder
description:
Wayfinder is a web-based generative art game that takes the player on a contemplative cause-and-effect journey through nature.

Combining artificial intelligence, machine learning and generative processes, each experience is as unique and ephemeral as nature itself. Players move a mystical character through the landscape in search of poetic tokens which, when activated, reveal words hidden in the wind. The poems and visuals players see today will never appear in the exact same way ever again.

name: Stones of Harlath
description:
Shipwrecked on the small island of Harlath, players will adventure through a mysterious Island and multiple dungeons, battling foes, solving puzzles, and ultimately discovering the nature of the curse that looms over the island.

Stones of Harlath is a VR first person adventure game. Players will play as a powerful battle mage, explore a mysterious island, adventure in many dungeons, wield swords & shields and cast powerful magic by drawing runes with their controller.

name: Pico Snail! Dream Castle
description:
Pico Snail is a Pico-8 game inspired by the musician Snail's House

You play as Snail-Chan, and are tasked with defending the Dream castle! You can run, jump, thwack enemies, and use stars you collect for special powers!

name: Zelda 1 / Metroid 1 Combo Randomizer
description:
This is a combination randomizer for the original NES Legend of Zelda and Metroid games.

The randomizer combines the two classics into a unified gaming experience, which allows gameplay to seamlessly switch from one game to the other via special portals added to each game. In addition, equipment and items from each game are shuffled across both worlds, creating a unique challenge where you aren't just completing one game and then the other, but one where you will have to transition between them several times in order to finish both.

name: Howrse
description: Breed horses, enter competitions and manage your own equestrian center!

name: Roark's Attack on Titan Fan Game
description: A complex aerial pvp(player versus player) game with design aspects and characters from the aot manga/anime.

name: Donkey Kong Country
description: Game Boy Color port of Donkey Kong Country.

name: Starsand
description: Starsand is a mystic survival game set among the dunes of an arcane desert. An open-world full of danger, vast environments and mysterious happenings await you! Explore, hunt, craft, build – and SURVIVE.

name: Dragon Break Classic Head to Head
description: Dragon Break Classic Head to Head is a retro arcade game that lets 1 and 2 players play head to head in a competitive arcade environment. Unique animated pixel bricks tumble down toward the users paddle along with Mini-Bosses and Powerups. Collect powerups as you progress through the levels and defeat your opponent. Thirty Levels to compete in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory in single player and two player modes.

name: Criss Cross
description: Animation System Visual Novel "Criss Cross."

name: The Mountain Hunting
description: Whether you hunt freely in the open world with the "Free Hunt" mode, or try to complete the missions given to you with the "MISSION" mode. Besides that this mode also includes interestingly extraordinary missions from time to time.

name: Fugitive 3D
description: Multiplayer, objective based, Hide & Seek! Cross-play between Flat and VR!

name: Revolver and Co
description: It's 2038, and a late maniacal inventor has left behind a legacy of madness - coordinates to an island full of wealthy robots, a gun that asks questions, and a widow that's hired you to answer them. As Izzy Buspec, the newest recruit to Randco, take charge of their patented revolver as you explore the densely packed biomes of Corvynnia, bringing down hordes of docile robots in a money-making adventure. Every time you fire, you'll have to answer one of over 2,000 trivia questions with answers based on numbers, percentages, geography, dates, and more - the further you are from the actual answer, the more of its own ammunition the revolver will discharge. If you run out, it's back to Randco HQ to reload! Revolver and Co features 105 story levels across 7 unique worlds and 12 question themes which will test you on a wide range of subjects, tied together with humorous debriefings between Izzy and her maniacal boss before the start of each mission. Or if you're looking for more of a challenge, have a go at one of the Endless challenges, which pits you against a barrage of questions until you finally succumb to an empty revolver chamber. You can even unlock more Endless challenges by completing the story levels, including a gruelling hour-long session where the only thing you have to lose is time.

name: 神启神落
description: 这是一款魔幻类地牢探险、角色扮演多玩法游戏，玩家扮演神启者，不断的招集神落者（游戏中的英雄）对抗挑战，目前开发试炼之地模式，支持选择的英雄提升等级及属性，同时游戏具有独特的魂体转化系统，每一次对噬魂者的毁灭都对应了新的神落者的重生，在之后的其它模式，玩家会召唤这些英雄参与群体战斗

name: HyperFeat
description: A top down 2D space shooter bulethell with roguelike elements awaits you. Dodge, weave and shoot your way through waves of enemies while gaining upgrades trying to survive as long as possible.

name: Fluffy Cubed
description:
Fluffy Cubed is a minimalist puzzle game where the mechanics are inspired by the famous Sokoban genre, of Japanese origin.

In this game, you play a kitten in the shape of a cube that must move the boxes to their places. But is not that simple, you'll need to analyze well your movements to make sure that the boxes will no get trapped.

The interface is simple, cute and you don't have to worry getting only one way to solve them, because there is many ways to complete the levels.

name: Puzzle Light: Rotate
description: Rotate the pieces to form the circuit and turn on the lights in this puzzle game.

name: Anime puzzle
description: Anime puzzle is a classic puzzle that offers you to put the picture together from a huge number of details!

name: Castlevania Advance Collection
description:
Castlevania Advance Collection includes three legendary Castlevania games that were first released in the early 2000s: Circle of the Moon, Aria of Sorrow, and Harmony of Despair. In addition, this collection also includes Castlevania: Dracula X and some never-before-seen sketches and artwork from the games!

All four games are enhanced with newly added modern features such as Rewind, Save/Load, and Replay, making this the best way possible to experience these classics or discover them for the first time! This collection also boasts a handy Encyclopedia, a Music Player with all soundtracks; and you can even change the ROM Region to play all games in different versions.

name: Anvil Saga
description: Anvil Saga is a management sim with RPG elements where you take control of a blacksmith shop amidst the Hundred Years' War. Each decision you make impacts the story and gameplay.

name: Sthell
description: STHELL is a fast-paced arena shooter that will take you to a forgotten swamp that was once a test site of Kiratron Industries. Take on hundreds of machines left to rust for years. It's a battle you probably won't win, but make a stand and your resilience will be etched in their memory chips forever.

name: Ladylike
description: Sin descripción

name: Alien Shooter 3D
description: Alien Shooter spin-off in a first-person perspective, For mobile phones.

name: Shiver 3D
description: Sin descripción

name: Open World Foreva
description: Explore, create & survive. In this large procedural world you can: Build, fight, explore, craft and much more. Every player is inside the same world, since interaction and co-creation is sought after. Play solo, or build with friends. Explore and find new technology to power your base!

name: I.O.R.C Impact Orbital Rescue Crew
description: A 2.5D arcade flight game, in which you take the roll of a rookie pilot flying a unique rescue aircraft to render dangerous falling space debris safe. Fly through 20 levels including 4 boss stages, and save the world!

name: Cat Slide Tiles
description: Move the sliding tiles to unblock a path for the kitten to walk to the exit.

name: Defense Tower Simulator
description: Welcome to Tower Defense Simulator and prepare yourself to protect your kingdom from different monsters! Join this game and prepare to many exciting missions with this great game!

name: The Last Poem: The Trials of Poe
description: The Last Poem - The Trials of Poe is a third person action RPG set in the mid-1800s that sends the player into the shoes of Edgar Allan Poe. It combines combat elements like those found in Dark Souls and related games with the RPG and travel elements found in games such as Kingdom Hearts.

name: ChicScape
description: A miniature arcade survival game as a chicken in a poultry farm. Climb the walls making long and short jumps from left to right and from right to the left to escape from the huge blade and avoid the chicken soup.

name: No Ghost in Stay Home
description: A dimly lit room, her first time stay home.... Do you gently watch over little Anna? Or....

name: Big Ambitions
description: Big Ambitions is a revolutionary role-playing business sim. Go from nothing to the biggest entrepreneur in New York by opening small businesses or slowly building huge corporations any way you like.

name: Decision: Red Daze
description: Decision: Red Daze is an action RPG with a unique mix of survival and tower defense mechanics. Explore an apocalyptic wasteland and experience the dread of a deadly new disease. The only way to save humanity from this danger is to fight back against hordes of horrifying enemies.

name: Charlie from the swamp
description: "Charlie from the swamp" is a metroidvania game about little frog in a big world.

name: Super Gobang
description: Classic Gobang and roguelike play combined to produce a single game. To advance to the group stage, to pass the knockout, to become stronger all the way, to compete with many players!

name: Janosik 2
description: Janosik 2 is a retro action-platformer with metroidvania elements. Get ready to jump, slash, dodge roll, dive, smash and bash your way through deadly traps, mischievous villains, troublesome bosses and more in this sequel to Janosik. You've never played a fairytale this cheerful and deadly.

name: Wildsilver
description: Wildsilver is a JRPG featuring an active-time battle system. With a party of up to four characters, visit towns and explore dungeons, find items and equipment, level up, choose between abilities and defeat powerful bosses. Enjoy beautiful and epic music in an emotional story with plot twists.

name: Wind Up!
description: Wind Up! is a multiplayer, family-friendly arena fighter! You and up to three friends play as wind-up toys that need to wind up to punch each other in explosive fashion!

name: The Faraway Land
description: The Faraway Land is an open world survival simulator. Plunge into the relaxing atmosphere of a magical world filled with cute and dangerous creatures.

name: Broken Blades
description: Avoid traps, upgrade your sword and reach powerful bosses to find a way out of the underworld. Enter the world of Broken Blades and let yourself be carried away by the adventure!

name: Scampr
description: Play a squirrel in an open-world game where you experience a peaceful yet surreal environment.

name: Mad Mustache
description: Mad Mustache is a Top Down shooter where the player controls a character who fires off zombies, dodges sharp saws that can shave off his mustache, and collects cards with upgrades.

name: Templar Castle Builder
description: Besiege and conquer the castles and towns of your enemies. Build siege machines and train your army to assault the fortified cities but do not neglect your defence system. Change the course of history, and do not let the Templar Order fall.

name: Slime Labs
description: You are a slime trying to traverse the labs with your ability to jump, shoot, control projectile speed, and equip fancy hats and weapons what could possibly go wrong.

name: Depths of Horror: Mushroom Day
description: This is a 3D first-person adventure and horror game that lets you plunge deep into your fears. A unique cave system, enemies and screamers. While picking mushrooms in a clearing, you stumble upon an abandoned hut. Exploring it, you find yourself in a cave full of unexpected inhabitants and surprises

name: The Court of Wanderers
description: The Court of Wanderers is a puzzle game focussed on logical and spatial reasoning. Enter an open world where you never know what you will find behind the next door. Wander, think, solve, and be amazed as the impossible becomes possible.

name: Rise of Peles
description: Incarnate a freshly transformed vampire, fight in epic combats and unlock mighty weapons through crafting. Expand your workshops and manage your lineage to craft the ultimate equipment. Venture through the universe of Peles and follow the path to victory!

name: Rising Spire
description: Uncover the long forgotten secrets of the angels, challenge divinity and take back your own fate in this immersive, turn based RPG inspired by the golden age of classic JRPGs. Forge deep relationships, explore the land, and master the true powers of the Nephilim.

name: Zombie Strike
description: Zombie Strike is a strategy RPG with AFK gameplay and various elements. Survivors can recruit heroes, transform zombies, build a mighty team to defend their home! This game has high intelligence AI automatic play. Let's say goodbye to manual operation, free your hands!

name: Steampunk Timer
description: A Dilated Time Tactical Action roguelite set in a ruined steampunk city where dying is a matter of time. Join the Traveling Theater Guild to stop the city governors and prevent a space-time collapse.

name: Hunger in Paradise
description: This is a casual game about Paradise - island where people are always starving. To get some food the player should point and click on correct letters to build the names of food.

name: Ergo
description: Ergo is a virtual reality puzzle game with several office based enviroments with varying amounts of difficulty.

name: Clock Overwhelmed
description: Organize tasks within your routine, but be careful not to overlap activities and get overwhelmed!

name: Warplane Inc.
description: Warplane inc is a 2D flight simulator in which the player will get acquainted with the history of a hypothetical war, the stories of its heroes and victims, as well as the development of military aviation.

name: Vi.Dange
description: Vi.Dange is a contemplative 3D experience where you play a human subject placed in the path of his own light. Discover in first person view no less than 25 visual and sound works and find your true identity.

name: Guild Hall Adventures
description: Action-packed RPG story, Hack n Slash all monsters in your wake. Build a town from scratch and research while gathering resources and leveling up by killing monsters in the area. Don't forget to delve into the dungeons and defend your created town from the Hordes of Monsters coming to destroy it.

name: Unicorn and Sweets 2
description: Unicorn and Sweets 2 is a match 3 category game made in combined 2D and 3D graphics.

name: Furry Shakespeare: Oops! All Dragons!
description: Train a group of misfits. Put on a holiday play. Be awesome. Or ruin capitalism forever. That's also awesome.

name: Kid Meat
description: Play ball tag with your friends in the most appropriate places for kids! Compete with others, avoid the traps, interact with levels and build your own!

name: Lust for Speed
description: Street Racing + Date Sim. Pimp your Ride! Win in a Drag-Racing competitions! Earn Reputation! Date the Racer Girls!

name: Matthew: Last Journey
description: Matthew: Last Journey - is a 3D indie adventure exploration game made in a low poly style. You will explore different locations and learn the story about the boy and his family. You will have a fascinating journey through picturesque places and try to find all the memorable objects.

name: Timeless Dual
description: Timeless Dual is a retro style action adventure, open world game. The world of the game changes as the player travels through seven time periods, collecting currency and upgrades and defeating enemies!

name: VR Another World
description: This is a walking simulation software for VR. You can freely walk around the medieval European style world. There are no game elements at all, and you can enjoy all the elements in as little as five minutes.

name: Was It Worth It?
description: Was it Worth it? is a first person story driven walking simulator. You play as Subject 105 and you do as you're told. DO NOT explore. DO NOT get tempted to stray from the path. DO build your new reality and enjoy your new life on earth.

name: Letters From a Rainy Day: Oceans and Lace
description: Luscious artwork brings the beautiful streets of Kamakura in June to life in this bittersweet sapphic story of a romance that begins with blackmail... This is a yuri adventure game based on the theme of love between girls at a lady's school in Kamakura, Japan.

name: Quin
description: A simple and fun card game to play with friends! Discard suit, or the same number, and be the first to run out of cards.

name: Bloody Merc
description: Bloody Merc is a casual Indie action title where you will control Fydora, a mercenary blood golem to accompany a civilization of your choice and charge against an entire rival army.

name: Cast Ashore
description: Aboard the Fusion Voyager rocket set for Mars, you find yourself in a state of panic as you scramble to save the mission from a complete disaster. Your efforts were unsuccessful and you are now the sole survivor of the crash which left you somewhere in the pacific ocean. Survive. Build. Explore.

name: Ricochet Bounce
description: Challenging puzzle game with hand crafted levels. Easy to learn but hard to complete!

name: Nature Treks: Together
description: Nature Treks: Together is a place just for you or a place to connect with others using a combination of shape, color, and sound. Intuitively transition deeper to rediscover the benefits of expression, the value of emotion, and escape into a powerful sensory experience.

name: Mr. Hopp's Playhouse 2
description: A young girl needs to find her friends, unravel a dark mystery and escape the clutches of her cursed toys.

name: The ordinary case of Margaret Luoni
description: The ordinary case of Margaret Luoni is a sci-fi detective game with a deep story. Help Detective Dirk understand what happened, explore a new futuristic world. There are no obvious solutions here, find your own approach to witnesses and look for hidden places and clues to discovery.

name: Comrades and Barons: Gates of Freedom
description: The Great War had barely ended, when Red Army started an offensive westwards to ignite the revolution in Europe. Comrades and Barons: Gates of Freedom is a hex wargame that lets you to relive the events on the battlefields of this turbulent time.

name: Dante's Hotel
description: Assume the role of Dante, a soul in search of redemption and experience every battle and terrifying events up-close. Explore a mysterious ever-changing hotel in a reinterpretation of Dante Alighieri's epic poem (The Divine Comedy), and enjoy a genuinely terrifying experience.

name: Dungeonite
description: Choose a character and obliterate your friends in a procedurally generated fast-paced top-down Arcade-style hero shoot 'em up.

name: Wayfarers Edge
description: Venture into a perilous and once impassable mountain range in Wayfarers Edge! An RPG focused on traversing unknown frontier lands in a fantasy/western setting to take hold of your future. Travel together with other brave settlers and build bonds to help overcome the dangers together!

name: Arcane Waters
description: From swashbuckling on the high seas to idyllic days on your peaceful farm, from remote trading towns to monster-filled lands, it’s time to gather some friends and go on an adventure! Whether you’re a pirate, trader, crafter or farmer, choose your ship and explore a vast new world.

name: Frosty Jumper
description: Jump from block of ice to block of ice and build your warm igloo before the temperature drops below freezing!

name: Gone Upstate
description: Gone Upstate is a relaxed survival sandbox game where you Hunt, Build and Craft in a vibrant wilderness. Explore the vast landscape, escape dangerous predators, buy or craft supplies, sell your farm crops and uncover the mysterious creatures!

name: Shipwreck Escape
description: Shipwreck Escape is a 2,5D immersive game with puzzle elements. The catastrophe happened when the cruise ship was sailing from Athens to Dubai. The main character is a croupier in a ship's casino and he got stuck in this sinking hell.

name: Black Space
description: Black Space is a free arena-styled singleplayer 2D space shooter using top-down perspective.

name: Unwell Known
description: An 8 bits retro aesthetics throw a dark reality of the borders between regions in which you will have to find the light that dispels the shadows of the path to hope. Everyone deserves a second chance.

name: Topper Carrier
description: Topper Carrier is a game that brings back the golden age of Arcade Racing games like Top Gear, Outrun and more!

name: Art of Destruction
description: A physics sandbox simulation game about constructing and demolishing structures. If you like destroying stuff or just mess around, then this game is for you!

name: DaCapo Delivers
description: A quick shopping game which increases in difficulty for 16 levels. You play as Sal DaCapo, a young boy in the 1930s. Start by supplying groceries to Mom and Pop's Pasta Place and Speakeasy, advance to have your own rackets, mob, and gun moll as the top boss.

name: Society's Paradigms
description: Society’s Paradigms is an action-packed social commentary based on the innovative combination of Rogue-lite and RPG elements. Explore a randomly generated world to obtain new skills and abilities. Experiment and combine passive and active skills to achieve insane combos and satisfying combat.

name: Sleepy Sunday
description: Welcome to your happiest nightmare! Fight your way through hordes of powerful enemies and meet a colorful cast of companions in this action-packed 2D roguelite!

name: Dev Inc
description: An in depth game development simulation game

name: The tram of wishes
description: The meditative journey game about a tram driver. He is a sincere but humble dreamer who loves his job. And he also knows how to show love and sensitivity, like reading other people's desires. But what to do about it?

name: Falafel Tycoon
description: Build your Falafel empire in Falafel tycoon! Hire staff and train them to make awesome sandwiches and serve your customers to get more ratings and receive good reviews. Customize your restaurant - with 100+ object you can place in your restaurant to customize, the possibilities are endless.

name: The Wind: A Story of Surrender
description: A short side-scrolling platformer about a little bird who lost the ability to fly. With about 40 minutes to an hour filled with parkour and puzzles, this cute little story aims to teach an important lesson to people who struggle to overcome emotional trauma.

name: Broken Robot
description: Broken Robot - 2D side-view platformer built on the physical control of broken robots, each race you get a new robot that does not have the best balance.

name: Elementowers
description: Co-op tower defense where you don't have to build towers and just watch the battle. Get directly involved in combat. Team up with you friend in the war against the great evil that seized the kingdom!

name: Buck Borris in Action
description: You and Buck Borris and you have only one goal to survive a single night, but for that you will have to beat various monsters, using your teleport skills, hand radius, and your super punches. That and Buck Borris in action, so let's go to the crap?

name: Parkur 44
description: There is only one rule in the game and that is to know the end of the track you play! You will be given a period of time before starting the course, during which time you will have to finish the game. If the time runs out, you have to start again from the very beginning of the track.

name: Daymare: 1994 Sandcastle
description: Daymare: 1994 Sandcastle is a third-person story-driven survival horror game prequel to the critically acclaimed Daymare: 1998. Step into the shoes of agent Dalila Reyes, a former government spy now in the service of H.A.D.E.S. unit and prepare to face the true horror.

name: The Isle of Elanor
description: You wash ashore on The Isle of Elanor, the last bastion of humanity remaining in the world. The situation on the island is grim. You're given a small plot of land. Can you help humanity survive?

name: Sketchy Fables
description: Sketchy Fables is a first-person exploration adventure and can be described as a comic book that has broken up over a landscape. Sketchy Fables strives to stimulate Your own imagination trough its various open puzzles set in an open world filled with cities and mysterious places to explore.

name: Lipstick Assassin
description: Lipstick Assassin is a Pulp, Sci-Fi, Action, Glam game. An action packed spy world of the future.

name: Zenko: A Fox's Tale
description: Zenko: A Fox's tale is a 3D adventure platformer that takes place in a Japanese inspired environment. A whimsical fox must move between realms to capture wandering spirits, discover new abilities, and restore an abandoned shrine.

name: A Clever Label
description: A documentary experience that explores the links between anti-LGBTQI lobbyists, politicians and organisations.

name: Expert on Domestication
description: For hundreds of years, the inhabitants and creatures of the continent of Vestria lived in harmony until... In the game, you will play an young man. You can visit towns, enjoy the beautiful history and culture, challenge and collect a variety of animals,uncover secretes. Take your pet and let's go!

name: Scraftion
description: This game is a multiplayer survival game with multiple maps. To survive, you have to find the right materials on the right maps. Build your base and have a good time with your friends.

name: Fishards
description: In this game you are wizard fish with legs that can combine 5 elements to create unique spells! Battle strangers, friends or hordes of evils Fishards by simply joining or hosting a room.

name: Adventures of The Carrot Captain
description: Classic Platformer inside the cartoony fantasy world of a Saturday Morning Cartoon!

name: Nightwalker 2
description: Nightwalker 2 is a horror adventure game that focuses on story and exploration. While trying to uncover the mysteries of the lost village, Nightwalker needs to do more than before to survive.

name: Ethernal War
description: Ethernal War is a third person hybrid of MOBA, Tower Defence and Strategie game. Fight online against other players, place buildings to build an army and destroy the enemy main building.

name: Lizard Lady vs the Cats
description: Sin descripción

name: Mysterious Blocks 2
description: Mysterious Blocks 2 is the second part of an exciting puzzle game in which you will find many interesting and difficult levels.

name: Mycro
description: Mycro is a gateway to another dimension! A series of Micro-Games await you on the other side! Surely you wish to visit?!?

name: Subrov
description: Pilot a Remotely Operated submarine and explore the oceans. Chart unknown regions, sample hydrothermal vents, discover new species -all while defying the darkness, crushing pressure, and freezing temperatures of the deeps.

name: Life In Planet
description: Build, arrive, and move into new regions and planets in the depths of space. Whether you will establish a colony and trade or train soldiers and fight, everything is in your hands.

name: Stellona
description: A rabbit western adventure with a large emphasis on exploration and discovery. Make friends. Explore the ruins of a long-dead civilization. Be a bunny.

name: Inside the Memories
description: Travel through your memories in this touching version of the "Find a Pair" game that carefully re imagine a classic mechanic with brand new challenges.

name: Kill Them With Cuteness
description: Kill Them With Cuteness is a Semi-open world 3D Platformer where Aliens have invaded, and the only way to stop them is through cute animals! Collect pets, help the island residents, find the Aliens and KILL THEM WITH CUTENESS!!!

name: I Remember the Light
description: A puzzle platformer game about living in 1D, 2D and 3D, changing dimensions, manipulating perspective and placing gravity portals.

name: Operation F.A.T.E.
description: The year is 2123 and things have gone horribly wrong. What was once Earth is now a sprawling wasteland of sentient machines and deadly AI. Is there any hope of saving the planet?

name: Train Tycoon
description: Manage your own train company! Be a businessman in the train industry, with control over everything in your business. Work, earn, invest and expand!

name: The Secret of Dyes
description: A puzzle game about dye three primary colors, lowpoly style, fresh painting style, let's explore the secret of dye!

name: The Handbook
description: Embark in a chaotic quest in a fantasy world to save a small town from certain destruction. Play as the great wizard Tim in an RPG while learning powerful spells and leveling your character. Explore the world, find its secrets and unravel the story behind The Handbook.

name: Rhythm Hero
description: Rhythm Hero is a game played only with mouse clicks and wheels in hexagonal spaces. You can play with various songs using the mouse like a joystick.

name: Puzzle & Maze
description: This game is action puzzle game. In game turn-based battles are also included. This game is crazy very hard and no hints

name: Driver4VR
description: Driver4VR is a software program that provides body tracking, head/hand tracking and controller emulation, utilities, and alternative VR configurations.

name: Chess Mega Bundle
description: Play hundreds of chess variants online or locally.

name: Arcade Boy
description: The story of a boy stuck in an arcade...

name: Japanese Puzzle
description: Japanese Puzzle is a puzzle-puzzle game made in 2D graphics, where you have to collect puzzles with anime girls.

name: GB Rober
description:
GB Rober is a fast-paced, expressive 2D action platformer. Shoot, jump, and dash your way through stages full of deadly robots and even deadlier traps. Defeat your bosses, take their weapons and use them against your enemies!

Fight for a world, where Bosses, Landlords, and the concept of private property are only a distant memory. Fight for the People!

name: Zombie Total War
description: A massively multiplayer online game where you join up to 4 people each round to fight waves and waves of zombies. See how long you can survive. Choose from a variety of locations, weapons and playable characters.

name: Balloon Jump
description: There is only one thing to do: JUMP! Can you stay alive?

name: VR Pianist
description: VR Pianist is a VR music game where you can play on virtual piano. Enjoy unique line-art graphic style together with contemporary, classical and orchestral music. Maybe you are the hidden talent waiting to be discovered!

name: The Survivor After
description: Sin descripción

name: Women's Quiz
description: Women’s Quiz is a videogame with questions about the life and work of famous women. You could find more than 200 questions about 50 relevant women in history such as Marie Curie, Amelia Earhart or Virginia Woolf.

name: Catmageddon
description: The legend tells Catlandida used to be a glorious, mystical land run solely by cats. It was prosperous beyond belief, had no crime and more riches than you can count. Few had seen the marvels of this foreign land because cats suspected the dishonest nature of the "Furless"... and rightfully so!

name: Animal Express
description: Animal Express is a chaotic co-op package delivery simulation game for one to four players. Assemble your team of couriers and pick, pack and deliver your orders in time!

name: Destinies
description: A companion app for the Destinies board game from Lucky Duck Games. Destinies is a competitive, story-driven, game of adventure and exploration, mixing an app and a board game.

name: Raising Torolith
description: Raising Torolith is a physics based first-person platformer. Embrace the parkour style and prove your agility by claiming the orbs that will raise the kingdom back! Medieval fantasy, relaxing & beautiful scenery. Raise castles and islands from the water. Come to Torolith and join the adventure!

name: Dredark
description: A free multiplayer ship construction and combat game. Build a flying battleship with your friends and conquer the skies!

name: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! for Nintendo Switch
description:
Popular rhythm game in Japan!
Tap to the rhythm of over 200 songs to choose from.
Play both original and cover songs from popular J-Pop artists and anime songs!
Play your favorite songs on a level of difficulty that suits you!

name: Idle Roboto
description: Build levels to collect scrap metal. Unlock more blocks with different purposes! New robots with different reactions to them!

name: Haunted Hotel: A Past Redeemed - Collector's Edition
description: Ghosts are threatening your wedding day!

name: To Be With You
description: A semi-autobiographical horror visual novel about unhealthy relationships. Can you help Alsie save her relationship from ruin?

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Isekai Quartet Adventure - Action Game
description:
Take control of Albedo, Megumin, Emilia, Tanya, and Raftaria, and conquer all 18 stages!

One day, a "button" suddenly appeared in the classroom. Pressing the button transports you to a mysterious world. Will everyone be able to return to the school safely?

Complete the "Isekai Quartet" Gallery! In each stage, there are hidden items that can be viewed in the "Gallery" once collected. Will you be able to find all the items? "Pixel Game Maker Series" is a series where you can enjoy games created using the action game production software " Pixel Game Maker MV"(Not available on Nintendo Switch) on Nintendo Switch.

name: Sakura Succubus 3
description: Ogasawara Hiroki was a normal man until he, by chance, learns that many members of Japan’s elite are actually succubi. And, what’s more, there’s something about his scent which makes them attracted to him. Now an encounter with a woman from his past can change everything. This woman introduces herself as Yue, the succubus queen. She intends to whisk Hiroki away to the succubus realm to keep him for her own. Trapped with Yue, Hiroki is faced with an ultimatum: will he succumb to her advances, or will he try to escape?

name: Caïssa Board
description: Caïssa Board is a modern chess GUI that is capable of interfacing with many chess engines while being tuned toward simplicity of use. It also provides tactical and strategic hints such as the possibility of forks or the controlled squares and is shipped with the public domain chess engine Gull 3.

name: Monochrome RPG Episode 1: The Maniacal Morning
description: Monochrome RPG is a 1920s cartoon adventure focused on exploring the political and societal struggles of the city of entertainment, Vaudeville

name: Edge of the Abyss Awaken
description: "Edge of the abyss Awakening" is an adventure game that combines third-person, action, Roguelite and RPG strategy selection. Players can match different weapons, entries and talents to form various gameplays for adventurous challenges. You can play solo or in teams of up to three people.

name: Switch It
description: A bit frustrating game where you have to reach the end using the different types of blocks that you have.

name: 7th Chance
description: 7th Chance is a short story-based exploration adventure game where you make choices that determine the fate of your character.

name: Sentry: Obelisk of Dawn
description: “Sentry :Obelisk of Dawn” is a VR-like MOBA game. The game supports 5vs5 sports at most, and players can customize and cultivate their own combat characters to participate in fierce battles on the battlefield.

name: Simple Ray tracing Mini Game 10
description: I tried to make 10 common simple mini games with the latest technology and ray tracing! Since it requires a lot of PC power, the app opens in a small window at the first startup. The window size can be changed dynamically.

name: Cactus Cowboy 3: Fully Loaded
description: Cactus Cowboy is back, in a fully fledged story shooter made for experienced VR Gamers.

name: Last Contingency
description: Last Contingency is a post-apocalyptic survival game pushing survival to it's brink! start on the outer banks of a deserted island in hopes to move inland & find better loot! join a team or be a lone wolf either way keep a sharp eye or you might find yourself alone on the outer banks once again!

name: Changes
description: A puzzle game about living structures that evolve every time you move.

name: Infees
description: Infees is a single player voxel game. At the moment it has only one playable mode where you have to kill zombies and survive as long as possible, there are many weapons at your disposal to make this task easier!

name: Four color jumps
description: "Four color jump" is an easy jump game. Players need to click the mouse to get the object in the middle of the screen to the end through the same color obstacle. The difficulty will gradually increase.

name: Soulfire: Weapon Master
description: Soulfire is a souls-like, side scroller action competitive game, integrating (stitching) multiple game modes, including the classic battle royale mode. Whether it is melee, long-range, or support, there will always be a fighting style that suits you. May you survive to the end in the cruel fighting!

name: U.F.O. K.O. Tower Defense
description: Place lasers, missile launchers, sniper turrets, and use combat strategies such as airstrikes and the space ray to repel waves of alien invaders in this sci-fi tower defense game.

name: Hot Air
description: Guide a hot air balloon through a series of levels filled with monsters, spikes, and other hazards.

name: Bilkins' Folly
description: Percy’s on a quest to find his missing relatives, and he needs your help! Join him and his beloved dog Drayton as they adventure through a series of unusual islands, solve puzzles to uncover valuable treasure, and bring to light the foreboding family secret buried beneath it all.

name: Diesel Brothers: Truck Building Simulator Editor
description:
Tuning trucks is all about eye-catching designs.

When you're in the need for a particular part, but just can't find it anywhere in the shop - make it yourself! Impress your customers and fan followers with one of a kind rims, astonishing exhaust tips, and other unique parts.

name: One Piece: World Seeker Episode Pass
description: Sin descripción

name: Kochira, Haha Naru Hoshi Yori
description:
A virus said to have come from space caused unprecedented damage to Earth. It has been a long time since that catastrophe, and now there are only six of us in Ikebukuro.

The city has been reduced in size and its buildings have been torn down and decorated with green grass and blue water. The scent of an air conditioner comes from somewhere ...

"This is Mother Earth!" And we are doing well today!

One morning, Kanako and five other girls woke up on a cruise ship. The inside of the ship was silent, with no traces of other people. The only memory they could recall was each other's names and the fact that they were on vacation together. With nothing else to do, they began to explore the ship.

name: Lyrica 2 Stars Align
description: Sin descripción

name: Lyrica & Lyrica 2 Stars Align
