description: Lyrica is a rhythm game that’s unique in many ways. It’s musically entertaining; it expresses literature artistically; it applied poetries in the gameplay and created a new gaming experience for the gamers.

name: Super Wumpus
description:
Text adventure with an overview of surrounding rooms for the ZX81 with a 16K memory expansion module.

The game allows you to set some parameters (like amount of food and arrows, but also the dungeon layout) before starting.

name: Origame
description:
Use your finger to fold the paper once. Keep folding it until you achieve the required shape.

Master Origami art and complete as many levels as possible!

name: Puzzrama
description:
Complete the puzzle of the silhouette! Assemble pieces and finish the silhouette puzzle.

Collect figurines by completing puzzles. Place the collected figurines on the field. Complete dioramas with the collected figurines. Use the crafting tool to craft your own figurines and dioramas.

name: Save the Fish!
description:
Save the Fish is a relaxing pull the pin game with many interesting brain teaser puzzles.

Solve challenging and unique puzzles while decorating your aquariums for your lovely fish. Lead your fish to safety by avoiding lava and poisonous gas and letting the water flow into the fish tank in this fun pin pulling game!

name: Hot Slide
description:
Drift your way to the world league! Introducing new exciting racing game, where you can test your drifting skill against real people from around the world. Download for free and start drifting now!

Collect and upgrade cars, take on solo and team challenges, win in one-on-one duels and get to the top position of world wide league. Would you choose Muscle or Street cars, Super cars or Off-Road SUVs? Pick the best car for every race and leave your opponents in the smoke of your hot slide.

name: Eggy
description: Eggy is a 2.5D artillery platformer where you aim and shoot an egg through a beautiful seamless environment. Egg-splore the world by rolling, swimming and bouncing in search for Eggy's mom.

name: N.E.O.N.: Never-Ending Onslaught of Nerds
description: We've missed going to in-person events this past year and feel the isolation, so we decided to replicate the convention experience! You are a famous cosplayer and influencer, and it's your job to smile for the camera... with a Never-Ending Onslaught of Nerds! (...Hey, that's us!) How long can YOU last before things get... Awkward?!

name: Frank and Drake
description: Turn-based narrative experience about two housemates with different time cycles. A contemporary take on the classic novels of Frankenstein and Dracula.

name: Sophie's Safecracking Simulator
description: Crack simulated safe locks using real techniques!

name: Frenzic: Overtime
description: Life on the factory floor at Frenzic Industries can be a bit chaotic as players assemble Power Cores for the new ZAPBOTs. As players meet their shift goals in a timely manner, they’ll be promoted to more rewarding positions on the assembly line. Players will face over 45 levels, multiple gameplay modes and hundreds of mini-goals as they uncover the secrets of Frenzic Industries, and ultimately, save the world.

name: Nanos World
description: nanos world is the next generation multiplayer sandbox game created by you and nanos. We do this by allowing players, developers and modders themselves to build their own game upon and to integrate their work in nanos world. Built upon Unreal Engine 4, nanos framework and our experience, especially from Just Cause 3: Multiplayer and other modifications we created, you can turn your world into whatever you’d like. Bringing all participants to the table, players can join thousands of different worlds and thousands of different game modes with only one game!

name: Dream Time
description: DREAM TIME is a game developed by bluedio's game team. By solving puzzles and challenges, players can understand the life of the protagonist step by step.

name: Snowboarding
description: Snowboard on slopes and on ramps, perform stunts and get points.

name: Word Escape
description: Create words to remove letters and flee through a procedurally generated dungeon. Armed with a customisable loadout of powerups, puzzle-solving and quick-thinking are required to escape the incoming wave of lava.

name: One more game
description: This is a single player self-propelled chess game including the mechanism of chess synthesis, relic, magic, front and back row position and so on. Players need to buy pieces, choose relic, defeat more and more powerful enemies and finally win

name: Fastlane Bowling
description: Realistic bowling simulation with12 extremely detailed 3D environments Choose from and personalize 8 lifelike male and female characters Control the strength, accuracy, position, and spin of every throw Fantasy locations include ancient Egypt, a Moon base, and a Pirate ship 6 game-play modes

name: Endless Love
description: Endless Love is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Speeder
description: Speeder is a game that aims to avoid obstacles. The speed increases with every minute. Break your records. Dynamic music will enhance your experience.

name: Peachleaf Valley: Seeds of Love
description: “Peachleaf Valley: Seeds Of Love” is a romance visual novel/otome game whose premise is inspired by farming-sim genre classics. Dive into a world filled with beauty, nature, and love as you become the newest resident of a lush valley where the sea, the sky, and the land all seem to meet...

name: Nina Aquila: Legal Eagle, Season One
description:
The chart-topping indie hit Nina Aquila: Legal Eagle, Season One comes to Steam, with a slew of enhancements and new features! Step into court as Nina Aquila, rookie defense attorney in this thrilling VN/adventure game hybrid, and fight for justice in a world where all anime genres exist at once!

This game replaces the earlier episodic releases and is a collected version of Chapters 1-3 of the "Nina Aquila: Legal Eagle" series.

name: Kings and Pigs
description: Kings and Pigs - fun pixelated 2D platformer with the ability to play together.

name: Spectral Ascension
description: Spectral Ascension is a fast paced battle royale taking place in the spirit realm. Take part in 4 short rounds of non-stop brawling. Gain points through eliminating your foes and be the last one standing. Use those points to upgrade your abilities and further your rampage.

name: Hook Master
description: Hook Master will test you ability and reflexes controlling a grab and taking car parts in a conveyor and putting them in the correct deposits, collecting money and upgrading you equipament. Are you capable to control a dynamic, intense and full of obstacles line of conveyors?

name: The Little Tank Hunter
description: Your mission is to destroy the tank master, can you do it? Shoot yourself through various levels and collect coins. Be careful, if you die you lose some of them. Find the hidden emeralds and use them to upgrade your tank.

name: Genetic Fluff
description: Genetic Fluff is a Action RPG creature collection adventure game with local multiplayer support for up to 4 players. Genetic Fluff has auto-saved RPG stages, creatures, plots, experience, and quests, mixed with rogue-lite items and loot.

name: Battle for Antares
description: Sin descripción

name: Battle for Antares
description: Battle for Antares is a fast-paced strategy game. You grow your empire, colonize star systems, build planetary infrastructure and combat drones to battle your opponent. Will you focus on research to crush your opponent with superior technology? Or do you outnumber and overwhelm the enemy early on?

name: Princess & Blade
description: A Clothing collection ARPG.Creatively to sets properties according to the appearance of the clothes. Hundreds of clothes for the protagonist to enjoy, experience different battle strategies because of different clothes.Fight accompany sexy,beauty or to become a heavily armored angel.

name: Skyward Descent
description: Use your jet to manoeuvre through and burn enemies. Discover powerful item synergies. Die repeatedly to tough bosses.

name: Mystery Solitaire: Powerful Alchemist
description: Play all the patience games and plunge into the world of alchemy!

name: The last tank fight
description: A 2D tank battle from a top corner, you can choose different combinations of module parts to complete the game, some levels have some weird and strange design, there are boss battles, there is a certain story line.

name: Reskue
description: Saving scientists from silence cosmic station. Action in retro-pixel art style.

name: Generation Ship
description: You're the AI, responsible for a generation ship, mankind's last hope for survival. Build efficient raw material cycles and help your crew to survive a long journey in a realistic real-time simulation and find a new home for the human race.

name: Shakespeare? More like Thirstspeare, amirite?
description: A human dating sim about writing a furry dating sim.

name: Agent Roswell: Tactics
description: Tactical turn based strategy game in an Alien invasion, inspired by classic boardgame rules. You will battle in a procedurally generated mission environments, upgrade your squad & equipment to battle against alien invaders and terrorists. No checkpoints, save only if you make it back to base alive..

name: Lost End
description: Lost End is a high degree of freedom game that combines text and cultivation. Players will control the protagonist to experience a youthful senior year and capture a lot of orc characters.

name: Masterplan Tycoon
description: Masterplan Tycoon is a real-time strategy game about building interconnected chains of resources in a minimalist visual style. The nodes are buildings. The pins are contact points between them. The links are supply lines. Create the largest logistics system possible.

name: Magic Exposure: Yuri Visual Novel
description: A cute Furry yuri visual novel about a rabbit who can fall in love with fantastic beings.

name: Mouse adventure
description: 3D adventure, platformer. A mouse wants to help a mechanic to repair cheese machine.

name: Direct Shot
description: Direct Shot is a new free online shooter. Where every player can show himself and his abilities in session matches using a large selection of modern weapons, with regularly held tournaments from developers, in which absolutely everyone can participate

name: Underwater
description: Underwater is a game in which you are to help a former war soldier to escape a submarine base on the edge of collapsing !

name: Play a ball
description: This is a very difficult game

name: Grapple
description: Grapple is a parkour game built for speedrunning. You're tasked to reach the end of the level only with the aid of a grappling hook & glider.

name: Pog 3
description: Cute, minimal physical puzzle.

name: Class of '09
description: This is the anti-visual novel. Instead of playing as some guy magically able to score with beautiful anime girls, YOU play the anime girl and create mass chaos in the lives of your potential "suitors". Earnest comedy, social accuracy, and late 2000's aesthetic await you in Class of '09!

name: The Story of Qingzhi Town
description: The betrayal of your partner makes you choose a different life. Although you have a vengeful heart, in this complex world, you still have new hopes and choices. Do you want to live with a mission, or let go of your obsession, or run your own hospital,or do you want to kill your enemy?

name: Merge It
description: This puzzle game is about creating new objects by colliding other ones. Also you can change instructions that say how exactly this process works.

name: Pole
description: Pole is a NES style platformer. You use a pole (like a staff/stick) to play. Pole has tough to beat levels and a rewarding story.

name: Terrorbane
description: Terrorbane is a comedic adventure where bugs are your friends! Enjoy exploring a crazy and outlandish world, full of unique, quirky characters and homages to the history of videogaming, challenge the Developer with your creativity and be the Bane of Errors!

name: Thirty Two HardMod
description: Go on a little adventure with a yellow cube. This is a minimalistic platformer in which you have to collect coins on levels to get to the next level.

name: Dance with me
description: 《Dance with me》 is a classic single player online VR music game with classic music game playing method and unique dressing system. Put on gorgeous clothes for your favorite role, experience new music fun in the game, and more tracks are waiting for you to unlock!

name: Dungeon Break TD
description: Immerse in this epic journey, where Tower Defense meets with Battle Chess. Control your Army, summon epic Heroes, build your Defenses and stop the vicious hordes of monsters. Climb the leaderboard in Multiplayer or slaughter enemies in Singleplayer.

name: 你的女朋友
description: Your girlfriend, big and white. This game, strong and powerful. Want to be happy? Just a few mouse clicks away.

name: Space Banditos
description: Between a group of bandits and a team of sheriffs, it's war. Everyone wants to reign over the area ...

name: Reigns of Samosbor
description: Try on the role of Head of the Bloc, one of the many settlements inside Gigakhrushchevka. Lead your Bloc through the horrors of Samosbor, conspiracies and lack of resources. Make the right decisions and try to survive!

name: Starship Simulator
description:
Step aboard a fully-simulated, realistic starship with 200+ rooms over 7 decks.

Explore a 1:1 scale galaxy driven by real astrophysics, in real-time, either solo or with friends.

Starsim has a lot to offer any space game fan, from Captaining a starship, to cooking for the crew. You'll have many things to repair in engineering and hopefully, not too many injuries in medical!

name: S.O.T.A 2
description: S.O.T.A - Stalker Online Time Anomaly is a multiplayer MMO TPS game with RPG and open world survival elements. The game takes place in an anomalous zone. The setting of the game is the Soviet local post-apocalypse.

name: Sonic Skateboard
description:
Sonic Skateboard is an LCD game created for distribution at McDonald's restaurants. They were offered as a part of Happy Meals for a limited time in 2004. This game was also released under the name Sonic the Hedgehog Extreme Boarding.

There are two main buttons on the game which control left and right movement. The game is a recreation of the Sonic 2 special stage as the player moves forward avoiding obstacles. There are three lanes that can be moved to and one is always open, while others may be occupied by bombs. There are also Rings which litter the screen, which can be collected. Once the player has collected 20 rings, they will move to the next level, which will be more fast paced, and thus harder. There are four levels to complete, and when one is completed, you will see a “Thumbs Up”, as it appeared in Sonic The Hedgehog 2.

name: Animal Defense Versus
description: Animal Defense vs is a player versus strategy game. What's different about the game is that it's full of random elements, random teams of heroes, random summoning, random positions, random cards, random bosses, random items, all in a random "face" mode.

name: Marionette lab
description: A third-person action game with a fixed camera and elements of survival horror.

name: Fast Food Mania 3D
description: Fast Food Mania 3D - a game in the genre of three in a row with a set of glasses, made in 3D graphics.

name: Animal Rivals: Up in the Air
description: Animal Rivals: Up In The Air is a party game with ridiculous graphics. The game will let you dive into racing courses set in the air. Invite your friends and get together into the addictive quadratic animals world!

name: Chicken!
description: In this game you play as a car going at another car the goal is to not hit the other car and to pass it much like the real life game of chicken. When playing you can move how ever you like forward, left, right, back if you feel like.

name: The Unnamed Game
description: The Unnamed Game is a top-down hardcore online game where you beat monsters to survive on a cursed reality.

name: Barn & Farm Renovator
description: Change the look and interior of old, dilapidated barns and farms. From changes in design to the perfect final touch. Improvise when you need to, but decorate with style and panache. Invest in the development of your remodeling company and celebrate each successful makeover.

name: Monster Slayer
description: Monster Slayer is a sci-fi style hunting FPS game where you fight extraterrestrial monsters that proliferate on an island on Earth. The gun that the Player is equipped with has three different types of bullets, and you must use the unique effects of each to fight your way through!

name: Alon
description: Alon – is an adventure game about a child who fell into the great abyss...

name: That Time I Got Reincarnated as an Orc
description: That Time I Got Reincarnated as an Orc follows Okubo Tatsuya. He is a 35-year-old convenience store clerk. He is an introvert, has no friends. One day, he received a text message signed "The Goddess": "Do you want to be a hero in another world?" Accidentally, he reincarnated in another world and became an orc...

name: Touhou 3D Dungeon
description: This is a 3D action game with retro-style graphics. Use Reimu and Marisa to solve the mysteries of the dungeon to clear it!

name: Infinite Brick Breaker
description: Launch balls and break bricks, collect more balls that you can launch and accumulate points indefinitely - this is Infinite Brick Breaker!

name: Bakumatsu Renka Shinsengumi
description: This is a romance game for women where you become the first female soldier in the Shinsengumi, fight alongside the other soldiers, and fall in love. Experience historical battles alongside the likes of Kondo, Hijikata, and Okita.

name: Word of Mouth Stories
description: A collection of scary stories that go around a small town. Word of Mouth Stories. Vol 1 is a third-person survival horror game inspired by the classics of the genre. Formidable enemies, atmospheric levels, and the style of old games and movies from the VHS era.

name: Overdosed VR
description: Overdosed (VR) You are a police officer in the crime run country of Colmbia. Every callout you respond to, you step into the dangers, of an anti-police state. Putting your life on the line, to serve those who matter.

name: Noesis II
description: In order to pay off the loan, the protagonist and childhood sweetheart work together to clean up the lonely death. After meeting the girl who claims to be the incarnation of the firefly, the protagonist quietly changes.

name: Leave No One Behind: la Drang
description: Leave No One Behind is tactical real time strategy war game. Experience some of the hardest battles fought during the Vietnam War in 1965 between US Army and the Army of the Northern Vietnam for landing zones X-Ray and Albany and for Plei Me special forces camp.

name: Pixel Adventure
description: Help Pixel navigate Retupmoc in this quaint 2D platformer, as they search for lost pixels.

name: Bio Crisis: Evil Hazard
description: Classic Survival-Horror styled Game with modern REemakes vibes. Escape the Town crowded with bloodthirsty unstopable Zombies! Solve the puzzles to make your way to safety. Or Save some Survivors on your way! It's you to Decide!

name: The Evil King
description: Text-Based Game, Adventure Game

name: Yokai Taiji
description: Yokai are creatures of different shapes and sizes but with greater power than humans. Yokai Taiji is an adventure game set in Japan. You will take the role of the last hunter of Yokai, who seeks to rescue his grandmother from these beings. Fear not and seal the Yokai.

name: Red Embrace: Mezzanine
description: Red Embrace: Mezzanine is a short, free visual novel/point-and-click game set in the vampire-themed Red Embrace universe.

name: Tank Fantastic
description: Tank Fantastic is an indie arcade game made in 2.5D graphics and Sci-Fi style.

name: Mindless
description: "Mindless" is a suspenseful FMV (Full Motion Video) interactive movie game. In this game, the player plays a detective with amnesia and uses the mindless system to experience the entire process of the case. By observing the behavior of everyone on the scene and the objects left on the scene after the incident, the player can find the key to solve the mystery and unlock more Multiple dialogue scenes and mysterious clues.

name: Bloons TD Battles 2
description:
Battle through a series of challenging Arenas and prove that you have what it takes to enter the fabled Hall of Masters and seize your glory!

From the creators of Bloons TD 6 comes a brand new installment of the top-rated head-to-head tower defense game. Gather your Hero, choose your team of powerful Monkey Towers, and prepare to battle one on one against other players and relentless waves of Bloons!

name: Logistical 3
description: Logistical 3 is a strategy puzzle game where you transport different cargoes to complete all the towns throughout each country and/or state. The whole game is a huge puzzle while each city is its own little piece of puzzling. Plenty of cities are easy enough plus a bunch of tougher challenges.

name: Hot Pot VR
description: Hot pot is an engaging cooking game that give you the chance to travel the world on a food truck! Are you able to cook every world recipe? Test and improve your skills! You can also challenge your online friends and other players! Who will cook much more dishes in the in the shortest possible time?

name: The King's Cards
description: A deckbuilding roguelike where you use and collect cards, explore 3 mysterious areas, and battle monsters. Collect powerful area-specific cards to deal massive damage to your opponents, and see if you can find your way through each level

name: NecroBoy: Path to Evilship
description: NecroBoy: Path to Evilship tells the story of a young necromancer aiming to become the greatest Lord of Evil! Using his dark powers, he’s bringing his NecroMinions back to life to do his bidding and solve puzzles to venture forth into the crypt of his infamous hero, NecroMan!

name: Promise of Wizard
description: Promise of Wizard or most widely known as Mahoyaku, is a mobile, otome-styled game with no romance created by Coly. In this game, players are tasked to train the wizards from the different countries in order to defend the world from the mysterious chaos brought by the moon. This game was officially released on November 26th, 2019.

name: Konung 1 + 2
description:
Konung 1 + 2 includes Konung: Legend of the North and Konung 2: Blood of Titans

The world of Konung is a unique and spacious fantasy land, that combines parts of known history with classical myths and the legends of the Chronicles, including immortal heroes, magical artefacts and ancient sorcery. The whole world is shaped by three cultures on the verge of the second millennium: tribes of wild Slavic hunters, noble traders of the still-powerful Byzantine Empire, and fearless Viking warriors.

name: Party Host 85
description: Party like it's 1985! You're the host of the wildest party of the century and have to plan and execute a succesful event. Get to know all the crazy characters and discover what they do will once the party started.

name: Escape: Forced Overtime
description: The heroine of this game was not lucky to meet with the thief when she came to work in a non-working day. Now she is tied up and she needs to find a way to free.

name: Axis Football 2021
description: Axis Football is a simulation-style football game featuring the industry's best franchise mode, massive customization, and realistic gameplay.

name: A Circle Among Squares
description: A hard, fast-paced, minimalist shooter/bullet hell/puzzle game. Survive and shoot all black squares (or make them shoot themselves). 200 levels, lots of enemies, plenty of retries and even more bullets!

name: Afterinfection
description: afterinfection It is an island game, a small island and has recently been infected with a type of virus and only a handful of people are left on the island to survive, find food, water and build a camp. To survive from zombies? Mutant And other survivors created using UNREAL ENGINE4

name: Anime Sunset Ride
description: Anime Sunset Ride is a puzzle game in which you have to find pairs of objects in the company of adorable girls.

name: Magic Mysteries
description: 魔法迷域是卡牌构筑+Roguelike+战旗

name: Just Cause 3: Multiplayer Mod
description: Just Cause 3 Multiplayer mod is a free fan-created project bringing an explosive and highly-customizable multiplayer to the critically acclaimed action sandbox game. Get ready for countless hours of hilarious brawls, stunts and races with hundreds of other players!

name: Monark: Deluxe Edition
description: Could you face yourself and the threats around you to save the ones you love?

name: World Quiz
description: World Quiz is a quiz game that will help you learn everything about geography in easy and enjoyable way. Challenge yourself in World Quiz and test your knowledge.

name: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy: Cosmic Deluxe Edition
description:
Fire up a wild ride across the cosmos with a fresh take on Marvel’s Guardians of the Galaxy. In this action-adventure game, you are Star-Lord leading the unpredictable Guardians from one explosion of chaos to the next. You got this. Probably.

The Cosmic Deluxe Edition includes:
- Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy
- SteelBook Case
- Sun-Lord Outfit for Star-Lord (Early Unlock)
- City-Lord Outfit for Star-Lord (Early Unlock)
- Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy: The Hits - Original Video Game Soundtrack (Digital Download)
- Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy: The Art of the Game Mini Artbook (Hardback)

name: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Mania - Anniversary Edition
description:
The Anniversary Edition includes:

- The game with a collectible sleeve
- 10 Exclusive Cosmetic Items
- Reversible Cover
- 40-page Art Book

name: King's Bounty II: King Collector's Edition
description:
This edition includes the following
Game: King's Bounty II [Day One Edition]
Bonus DLC's - Rod of Deception, Frosthammer, Staff of Harmony, Tyrant's Sword
Armor of the Hollow (armor set)
Heroes & Villains Premium Pack and King's Watchdogs (unit).
King’s Crown: A collectible item
Poster: Double-sided poster featuring artwork & map
Soundtrack: Selection of in-game music
Artbook: Hardcover Artbook

name: Big Rumble Boxing: Creed Champions - Day One Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Paul: vs. The CIA Gold
description: Sin descripción

name: SpellHunter
description: A puzzle game for young and old ... to relax on the bus and train or learn to read and write for the younger among us. The atmospheric pictures and music pieces relax and motivate in equal measure.

name: The Bounty Huntress
description: In this a Metroidvania style game made in crispy pixel art, Join Rhea , a bounty huntress with a task to save some people who have been kidnapped and taken to an old abandoned castle where there are many dangers, she needs your help to rescue these people and to bring peace to the city of Vaunard

name: The Game is ON
description: Boris wants to learn English, but he's having problems with idioms. Solve wacky puzzles to discover hidden phrases and help him out. The Game is ON.

name: Rebel! Pure Love Fighters!
description: Gerard wants to be a hero like a brave, and childhood sweetheart Madilia discovers a terrifying conspiracy in the process of realizing their dreams. What kind of test will they face?

name: Zone of War
description: Crashed in a parallel planet make your way through the diverse array of enemies already at war! Rival your opponents with your superior intellect. Solve problems, tackle difficult situations, cause havoc to get home, & most of all have fun with your friends or replay the story for hidden content.

name: Nanoscape VR
description: Nanoscape VR takes users on a journey to the microscopic world. Explore the surface and interior of a cancer cell, exploring and learning about cellular anatomy and processes.

name: Hogvalord
description: A combination of action RPG and farming simulation game. You play as Lucas, whose dream is to start a hog farm business in his homeland. But life is not easy, with many monsters that eager to have both you and your hog's meat in their stomach, can you survive without superpower or magical skill?

name: Helpless
description: A small, survival horror game with retro style graphics similar to consoles from the past. Explore, collect items, and hide from any possible danger.

name: Slime Girl Smoothies
description: Prepare to see a lot of jugs while mixing up some very wacky drinks in this Slime Girl bar puzzle!

name: Repeat
description: Repeat is an atmospheric first person single player puzzle game. There is a rift deep in space. Absorbs everything, but it does not absorb you. Stop the collapse. Repeat.

name: Tankbox
description: Tankbox is a top-down perspective/orthographic shooter. Fight it out against specialized AI-controlled tanks cooperatively with a friend or by yourself.

name: Guild Project
description: An old school turn-based dungeon crawler inspired by classic JRPGs- manage a party of beautiful heroines as they face off against mischievous monster girls!

name: Smackit Hamster
description: A group of hamsters suddenly appeared, hoping that you can eliminate more hamsters in a certain period of time.

name: My Cute Pagangirl
description: ⨁My Cute PAGANGIRL⨁ – is a satyrical visual novel with “match-3” type of gameplay. Spend an exciting summer vacation with cute anime pagangirls in Magna Germania!

name: Lustful Tribe
description: This ironic ero-game is about fun adventures and joyful sex: сollect hentai girls, fight them in nostalgic battles, romance them, complete ridiculous tasks, play through the non-linear story – and conquer the Lustful Tribe!

name: Sakura Forest Girls 2
description: Join Yaya and Aiyana in the second part of the Sakura Forst Girls series, as they continue to search for their missing friend, Koko. Locating her should be an easy task now they’ve enlisted the help of the witch Maia, but they soon find themselves in a sticky situation…

name: Trap Adventure
description: "Trap Dungeon" is an old-schoold 2.5 roguelite game about an escape from dangerous dungeon. Avoid numerous deadly traps, hide from bloodthirsty enemies and press the buttons that will open the way for you!

name: Negligee: Girls Night
description: This is a fun, tongue in cheek story of lustful urges and workplace romance. As two women go on a night out together to reaffirm their friendship as they start to work together once more.

name: Monsters Per Second
description: In this party-based strategy defence game you will visit distant planets, build small camps and battle fierce monsters. Can you survive by learning and exploiting their weaknesses or is your party doomed to never return home?

name: Your First Girlfriend
description: When was your first girlfriend? Now although we have grown up, but will inadvertently think of the first girlfriend?

name: Hold the Dots!
description: An arcade game where you can see the beauty

name: 6 in 1 Time Management Game Collection
description: Collection of six time management games: Caveman Tales, Country Tales, Kingdom Tales, Kingdom Tales 2, Fate of the Pharaoh and Julie's Sweets. In Julie's Sweets, players run a restaurant and serve customers. In the other games, players must gather resources to construct buildings.

name: Angry Alligator
description: Come on down to the swamp and join this alligator on an adventure like no other! Start as a small baby gator and grow into the biggest, baddest reptile around. Eat everything that moves, and more, so you can grow big and strong to face all challenges ahead.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI Anthology
description:
MAKE HISTORY in one of the most critically acclaimed and influential game franchises in strategy game history! This bundle contains Civilization VI and all its previously-released console content*. It's intended for people new to Civilization VI.

*The Red Death playable scenario released on PC isn't available on consoles.

name: Madden NFL 22: MVP Edition
description:
The MVP Edition includes:
- 3 Day early access
- Dual Entitlement
- Franchise: 60 Staff points
- Face of the Franchise & The Yard: The General player class starting at Level 10
- Tom Brady gear capsule
- Choice of 1 out of 32 NFL Stars
- Choice of Brady or Mahomes Elite Item
- Exclusive Challenges during early access window
- 11 Team Fantasy packs

name: Minecraft Dungeons: Hidden Depths
description: Dive into your next adventure with the new Minecraft Dungeons: Hidden Depths DLC! A shard from the Orb of Dominance carried on a dark current now awakens creatures that have long slumbered beneath the waves.

name: Merge & Blade
description:
Merge and Blade is a fantasy puzzle game.
You will engage in large-scale battles with monsters with your own squad which is made using merge mechanics.

After a battle, you can recruit new units using merge mechanics.
By proceeding with these puzzles and battles, you will retake the castles occupied by monsters.

name: Rasetsu Fuumaden
description:
Welcome to an Edo period where demons, humans, and gods exist.
Get in the role of Raki, the demon princess, and her incredible sealing powers.
Make full use of the unique "sword technique" and "barrier technique" system.
Enjoy this action RPG similar to the famed Ys series!

name: MeltyMoment
description: Sin descripción

name: Tribes of Midgard: Deluxe Edition
description: Mythical creatures, deadly spirits, and gigantic brutes threaten to bring on Ragnarök - the end of the world! It's up to you, a mighty Einherjar, to cut short your glorious feast in Valhalla and return to Midgard. There, you'll need to become the ultimate Viking and survive - even thrive to save your village, and the world, from total destruction. Luckily, you don't have to brave it alone: your (mostly) fearless tribe of co-op companions will help you build up village defenses and find treasures through a vast, beautiful real mall while doomsday ticks closer and closer. But don't let that stop your tribe from having the best apocalypse of your lives. "Surthrive" is the Viking way in Tribes of Midgard, a multiplayer, action-survival RPG of gigantic proportions.

name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles
description:
Become the blade that destroys demons!

In Solo Mode, follow Tanjiro through the story from the Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaibaanime as he faces demons in order to turn his sister Nezuko, who has become a demon, back into a human.

In Versus Mode, characters from the anime, including Tanjiro and Nezuko, can be freely matched against each another in a one-versus-one setting with up to two players online or offline! Enjoy this simple but exhilarating battle system, and become the greatest demon slayer you can!

name: Orpiment
description: Orpiment is a rogue-like game, based on a deck-building system, and real-time strategy knights duels. Players look at automatic jousts and change the outcome of the fight by using public members' actions in real-time.

name: Distant Dials
description: Distant Dials is a science-fiction MUSH (multi-user shared hallucination). It’s a multiplayer game requiring the player to create parts of the experience with others.

name: Hack Bomb Boma-ye
description: 『Hack Bomb BOMA-YE』 is an online bomb battle game for up to four players. You control the player in the game and use bombs to take down other players! In order to defeat your opponents, you can not only control the bombs, but also use the terminal to change the status of yourself and other players.

name: Mesobira Island
description: 《莫西比亚岛》是一款怀旧、剧情向的RPG游戏。以少年冒险为主轴，氛围轻松、明亮鲜快。跟着本作一起，畅游架空的大陆斯可维，在帕尔斯王国来一场愉快的冒险征途~重温少年时代的感动~

name: Hyde & Seek
description: ALL IS FAIR IN HYDE & SEEK. BETRAY, OUTWIT, AND DEVOUR YOUR FELLOW GUESTS TO SECURE YOUR FREEDOM! You have one goal: collect gems from around the manor. But be careful - rumor has it that when night falls, the manor's guests will turn into monsters!

name: Isekai Team: Another World Adventure
description: Will you choose to defeat the demon Lord and save the world when the forces of erosion are in the other world?Or is it...It's a Roguelike real-time dungeon adventure where players are given powerful weapons and blessings to defeat increasingly powerful enemies.

name: Hentai Jigsaw Photo Studio: Fruit Girls
description: This is the perfect game for those who want to enjoy the famous and juicy Fruit Girls while playing with just one hand! Complete puzzles by choosing your challenge level and indulge yourself in the most delicious photo shoots you've ever seen. Unlock all Fruit Girls for a special surprise!

name: Hot Summer
description: Hot Summer is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Super Bot
description: Take part in the adventures of "Super Bot", an action adventure game from a third person perspective. The main character is a cute robot, which, due to the domination of the industrial planet by nasty bugs, sets out to fight to regain energy and save his friends.

name: Zephon
description: Zephon is a post-apocalyptic 4X strategy game built on Proxy’s unique tactical combat system. Guide survivors through a grimdark future, navigating unexpected disasters, eldritch horror and cyberpunk monstrosities. What will you do to survive?

name: Palladise Island
description: Palladise Island is a easy idle game that is suitable for someone who want to relax or mess around.

name: The Grotto Diary
description: The Grotto Diary is a Oriental style horror game. In the midnight, Hua Xiaoxi was on the way home as usual, but she felt the strange look behind her. She never expected that she would be in this peaceful neighborhood, with a sense of evil is following her. Can she get out of danger? nobody knows.

name: Neko Beach
description: At Neko Beach girls are hot by the sun and they are waiting for you with attention and shamelessness. And of course, there are the sea and palm trees.

name: Mirror Magic
description: In this game, you play as a 30-year-old otaku who has never even held a girl's hand. But because chance coincidence however, accidentally met unexpectedly 3 beautiful person.What kind of story will three different styles of beauty unfold with you?

name: Remember Me
description: Remember Me is a galgame with a male first-person perspective. Players will play a high school student Lin Yining, and three girls launched their own story. It's up to you to choose between the hidden past and the future to reveal.

name: Polka
description:
Rpg created by Commodorette.
Polka is the second game in the Time Traveler Universe trilogy.
In this world, magic and relative unnatural events are the norm. It is a magical world where there are humans, "fairies", creatures similar to dragons, also called Gigas, Demons, Wizards, Sorcerers and finally, Witches.
Due to the content of the game, it will be classified for over 16 years as it has sensitive topics such as child abuse, necrophilia, and other sensitive topics that may hurt the sensitivity of the players, and some scenes of gore.

name: Wordland 3
description: The continuation of the successful Wordland. This game is a mix of puzzles and crosswords. Answer the clues, arrange the pieces and discover the words.

name: Furry Shakespeare: To Date or Not to Date Spooky Cat Girls?
description: Something odd is happening to the senior class at Elsinore Academy, and it is up to you to break the curse! Navigate college life and try to solve the mystery of why everyone is spooky at the same time!

name: Jigsaw Puzzle VR
description: Assemble Jigsaw Puzzles in Virtual Reality!

name: Dexter Stardust: Adventures in Outer Space
description: A spacey classic adventure for all! Dexter Stardust: Adventures in Outer Space is a classic point and click adventure; you can walk, talk, and interact with everything in your surroundings. Use and pick up inventory items to solve puzzles in over 100 unique scenes. Playing Dexter Stardust is like watching back to back episodes of a Saturday morning cartoon! With 5 total episodes, feel free to jump to or replay any episode you’d like, at any time.

name: Oktogone Melee
description: They took from us the Masters of ours musics for years... It's time to get them back! Play your favorite rappers and go pick up the masters of your musics in your old record label.

name: Robobo TM
description: Immerse yourself in a strange world. Shoot all Time Gears to stop the time counter. Find and get all the Buggy Bugs. Update yourself and discover new skills. Save those trapped in the ice and help the Teetaks.

name: Absolute Zero
description: A race known as the Snastipods has destroyed the Earth and enslaved its population. Your quest is to help Samantha Snark AKA "Sammy" survive on the Absolute Zero Space Station, end Snastipod tyranny and invoke revenge for the people of Earth.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Yukon Valley
description: Referred to by some as "The Last Frontier" and "The Land of the Midnight Sun", it's hard to deny that Alaska is a place of untamed natural beauty. Under the watchful gaze and devoted care of warden Jim Murray, Yukon Valley has become a haven for knowledgeable hunters and ecologists, looking to maintain the delicate balance of the...

name: Putahe ng Ina Mo
description:
Missing your nanay's home cooked meal? Live stream and "make handa" the perfect bowl of sinigang with this bite sized cooking experience.

All the ingredients are prepped in the counter, and there's a magically set up live streamed camera. Easy? Think again! We're not telling you how to do it.

name: Hidden Shapes Old West
description: Relax and have fun with beautiful hand-drawn jigsaw puzzle inspired by the Old West, created exclusively for you to rescue your tranquility and be amazed by a beautiful art with each puzzle solved!

name: Slime VS. Female Hero Party
description: In this game you, as a slime, defeat four female heroes.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Relics of War: Specialist Pack
description: New unit types for all factions enter the fray with the Specialist Pack. Each of the new units brings something new to their faction: support abilities, superior firepower, devastating psyker powers, and more.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Relics of War: Fortification Pack
description: The Fortification Pack is an expansion for Warhammer 40.000 Gladius - Relics of War, bringing one new defensive unit to each faction, widely expanding the existing roster. With a total of six new units, this DLC is a must-have and will enlarge the strategic options to all players.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Relics of War: Reinforcement Pack
description: Reinforcements are deployed on the frontlines as war intensifies. The high commands of the four armies fighting over the control of Gladius Prime send in squads that could tip the balance of power. But a new insidious enemy lurks in the shadows: they have bid their time, and they are now ready to strike…

name: Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Relics of War: Assault Pack
description: The Assault Pack greatly expands your tactical options by introducing a new unit for each faction! These new units are entirely focused on offensive power and mobility. Enact new tactics and bold new aggressive strategies by fielding them on the wartorn surface of Gladius.

name: Anagraphs: An Anagram Game With a Twist
description: Anagrams with a twist! From the creator of the popular word game Synonymy, an addicting new word game where the anagram possibilities are greater than ever before.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Cilie Oldphartz Railroad
description: The Cilie Oldphartz Railroad Company is a TRS19 model railroad style route that comes in three variants - a narrow gauge logging railroad, a narrow gauge mining railroad and a standard gauge railroad. Each has the same track layout, with variations to suit the gauge and theme.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Chicago Museum of Science and Industry Model Railroad
description: One of the most amazing model railroads in the world, this prototypical representation will spark your imagination, with plenty of action with lots of trains and industries.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Tnfrhs Refrigerator Wagon
description: The Tnfrhs 32-Refrigerated wagon takes us once again "down memory lane". This "cool" fellow was built from 1936 and was in service for many decades.
